description: The Wifi Radar is an application which can display the physical location of wireless networks. The application uses your device's digital compass for determining the location of each network. See the wireless networks around you, recover your default passwords for your wifi network, analyze signals or find the best channel for your Access Point. Features: - 360° Radar Scan with compass visualization. - Recover default passwords for your wifi network with keygen (a lot of common routers are supported). - Signal strength graph analyzer. - Channel analyzer. *** Additional Info: All used keygen algorithms are from public domain/open source code. The permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and READ_PHONE_STATE is used by the ad library for caching ads on the device for better performance and for reading the unique device identifier of the device for statistical purposes.
release_text: ver. 3.03 Marshmallow support and compass fix ver. 3.01-2 Minor bug fixes (occurring on specific devices) Connect to best open spot fix ver. 3.00 Material Design Keygen added to recover you default passwords New advanced compass mechanism Remove ads by watching short video clip Many bug fixes The application is currently in beta stage, please feel free to send suggestions, report bugs and errors.

description: Come explore with NASA and discover the latest images, videos, mission information, news, feature stories, tweets, NASA TV and featured content with the NASA App for Android. Features: - Over 14,000 images (and growing everyday) - Latest news and features stories - Latest on demand NASA videos from around the agency - Current NASA mission Information - Live streaming of NASA TV - Live streaming video from the High Definition Earth Viewing (HDEV) experiment on the ISS - Launch information & countdown clocks - Current visible passes for the International Space Station (ISS) and notifications - Current visible passes for other missions (Fermi, Hinode, Hubble...) - ISS and Earth orbiting satellite trackers - NASA Twitter Feeds from around the agency - Facebook® Connect and integrated Twitter™ client for easy sharing - Schedule for NASA TV and NASA-Related Programming on Other TV Channels - Map, information and links to all of the NASA visitor centers - Featured content and program sections - Earth as Art image collection and interactive map - Third Rock Radio (alternative rock radio station) - Favorites & image bookmarks - 5 star rating system for images and videos with top rated list
release_text: - Fix for Third Rock Radio - Minor bug fixes & stability improvements If you're experiencing any problems and need technical support for the NASA App: Please email us at: arc-dl-mobile@mail.nasa.gov

description: DOWNLOAD WITH US, CANADIAN GREAT LAKES & GULF OF MEXICO NAUTICAL CHARTS OVERLAYS!!! You have been searching for affordable and meaningful app product to enhance your saltwater fishing activities and we have good news. Fishing Ops Pro uses the latest technologies to empower you with information and insight from every experience so you can maximize your results. We deliver the best in class saltwater fishing application and website for our valued friends (AKA customers). We designed Fishing Ops Pro to be easy and effective regardless of your activity or experience level. When we share what we love and by aligning our passion for our product with your passion for quality, our community will grow as big as the Great Outdoors! Your data is kept totally secure with a unique system, which is only accessible by you! Here is what you get in our product: 1. EXCELLENT MAPS- Navigate marine environments with confidence in different terrains and bodies of water. 2. GPS NAVIGATION AND ONE-TOUCH WAYPOINTS - Easily maintain current position, view the relationship to other points of interest, and quickly mark waypoints of fishing interest and navigational interest. 3. CATCH/CATCH & RELEASE/RECON NOTES- Save your pictures and easily record your tackle and tactic details and easily compare the next time you go. Fish with confidence! 4. FISHING CAMERA- Capture all the action without leaving the app and every picture can auto collect all of the environmental details automatically! 5. AUTO-JOURNAL- No more hand written journals that steal your time. The first ever journal that auto stores every fishing activity and auto collects all the environmental details. 6. AUTO TRIP SHARING- Never wait again for pictures, everyone auto shares all the memories from your angling exploits automatically! 7. FISHING WEATHER- Get the forecast, marine forecast, tides, barometer and the lunar phase. 8. EAST TRIP SETUP- Set up your trip and invite your buddies for a seamless experience that collects all the pictures, all the waypoints and all the fun! 9. FISH-ON STEALTH NOTIFICATIONS- When you are fishing with friends but in different locations and you don't want to let the whole world know over the radio or don't have time to text or call, we offer a one-and-done push button that sends your friends your activity and gives them your GPS location for getting in on the action! 10. US STATE BY STATE FISHING REGS- Is it legal? Never worry when the game warden checks your cooler. 11. ON-BOARD SUPPORT- We offer you the answers to your questions with amazing support that answers all requests within one hour. Read the poor support of other apps. We love our products and our friends (AKA Customers) and we are always ready to help! 12. METRIC AND IMPERIAL SETTINGS- Easily switch all measurement to what you are accustomed to very easily. 13. IN-APP SOCIAL MEDIA SHARING- Connect with buddies, share info and pictures easily and seamlessly!

RPSC GK app : let us prepare for RPSC Examination. Content : * Current GK * Rajasthan GK * General Science * Geography * Indian History Feature * Quiz based learning system * Important and selected question * Useful App for RPSC Lecturer * Useful for RTET,REET and teacher Regular updated.

KillSud - Killer Sudoku is a variation of Sudoku, as described at Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killer_sudoku In addition to the rules of regular Sudoku, there are two more rules in KillSud: 1) The sum of all numbers in a cage must match the small number printed in its corner. 2) No number appears more than once in a cage. Play the exciting game of KillSud and test your skills. * KillSud contains over 4,000 puzzles ranging from fairly easy to really complicated in 6 levels of difficulty. * A special sum calculator to help in choosing the numbers. * Detailed help is available under "menu". * AutoSave / AutoRestore of ongoing puzzle. * Undo moves (no redo) - See Help for details. If you encounter any bug in KillSud please e-mail the developer with details. Don't report it in reviews NOTE1: Click the white area of the running timer to toggle showing elapsed time on/off. NOTE2: The little purple box below the [new] button is an addition helper. Click on it and the sum of the "marked cage" is added. To prevent adding the same cage twice, each cage can be added to the addition helper ONLY ONCE (until the helper is cleared) Long-click the helper to clear it.
release_text: version 6.4: Menu button on bottom-left. This will bring a "menu" screen. Exit this screen ONLY with "Return" button. version 6.3: If menu button is not available (neither by long-click task switcher, nor by 3 dots) then click the 3 white bars at the bottom-left of the main screen (where you choose the level of play) This should solve the "missing" menu button for newer android versions.

All major Global market indexes including Dow Jones, Nasdaq, CAC, DAX, Nikkei, Hang Seng and many more are displayed in tabular format. * All US, European and Asian Markets are displayed as list in separate tabs * Feature to view the full details of individual market index with charts on click of stock name row * Full size charts * Related News Stories * Ability to add/remove indices of your choice. * Optimized for tablets **Pro version is now available.** If you like this application, consider upgrading to "Global Stock Markets Pro" to support the development of the app. Pro version is faster, cleaner and Ad free. Pro version has seven chart options.

description: MightyMeeting is the best way to share presentations, videos, interactive applications, and drawings in the classroom, meeting room, and online. PowerPoint presentations and PDF documents can be stored in your private and secure online content repository, downloaded to your Android tablet, and opened anywhere, even when your device is not connected to the Internet. You can quickly switch between presentations or jump to any slide in a presentation. You can annotate slides with drawings. You can also create an interactive whiteboard and use it to draw diagrams or write mathematical equations. Content, applications, and drawings can be shared in online meetings. A meeting attendee can join via tablet, phone, or any other device with a web browser. At the end of a meeting, you can email slides, annotations, and drawings as a PDF document. Here are just a few ways to use MightyMeeting: -Open a sales presentation and share it with a prospect locally or remotely -Take turns presenting slides and drawings in a team meeting -Brainstorm on product design ideas by drawing on a shared whiteboard -Control slides remotely and share the whiteboard in a boardroom meeting -Share mathematical formulas and diagrams with fellow researchers -Teach a class remotely and share slides and drawings with your students Use MightyMeeting today to engage your audience and transform a one-way presentation into a collaborative experience. Make Every Meeting a Mighty Meeting.
release_text: Provided the multiple choice questions plugin

description: 在手機上也能夠瀏覽台灣最大的BBS網路社群PTT！就算沒有PTT帳號也能使用！還可在手機上註冊帳號 Mo PTT提供最直覺的操作介面，讓你在手機上也能夠輕鬆的瀏覽PTT，出門在外再也不用擔心漏看任何PO文了！遇到好文想推就推，不用再匆匆忙忙趕回家開電腦！ 使用最潮流的Mo PTT，瀏覽最潮流的批踢踢實業坊 你從內到外都將成為最潮流的鄉民！ 【特色與功能】 直覺操作介面 沒有PTT帳號也能開心使用 黑色與白色背景及10種主題色彩 支援橫向頁面 支援PTT2以及安全連線模式 我的最愛、分類群組、熱門看板及精華區瀏覽 熱門文章讓你輕鬆關注各大看板熱門話題 我的最愛新增與移除: 在看板名稱上長按可叫出選單 支援由上至下與由下至上兩種文章順序 返回手勢支援：在看板列表、文章列表及文章內容頁面向右滑動可回到上一頁 支援推文、發表、回應文章及信件，過長推文自動幫你分段送出！ 支援編輯文章功能讓你不怕發錯文手足無措 發文推文可附圖，有圖有真相！ 轉寄文章功能：把好文轉寄到站內信或外部信箱收藏，日後還可慢慢回味！ 支援文章內容超連結、圖片載入及文字色彩顯示 馬上分享好文章 可在桌面建立看板捷徑，輕輕鬆鬆進看板！ 新文追蹤Widget讓你追蹤新文超輕鬆 斷線後瀏覽狀態自動回復 (開啟上站通知功能容易導致出錯，請斟酌使用) (Mo PTT未在ART模式下進行過功能測試，很可能會導致錯誤發生，請斟酌使用) 【部落客推薦】 電腦王阿達 - Mo PTT – 全世界最好的 PTT 行動裝置閱讀App http://www.kocpc.com.tw/archives/1681 【榮獲獎項】 2012華人行動應用大賞 – 應用類最佳應用金獎 有任何疑問都可以到Mo PTT Facebook粉絲團詢問 http://www.facebook.com/moptt 或直接寄Email給我哦! support@moptt.tw 合作相關信件請寄送至: cooperate@moptt.tw

description: Sports Cards makes it fun to make your own fully customized baseball, basketball, cricket, dance, football, soccer, hockey, bowling, golf, martial arts, racing, tennis, and volleyball sport cards for you and your teams! Just like the pros! Customize the color, player name, team name and position, then take or select a photo to personalize one of four cool card designs. More designs are available for purchase to give you 16 different card styles to choose from. Lots of combinations to choose from. Found a style that you like? Use the clone feature to quickly build out an entire collection for your whole team! Once your card is created share with your friends through Facebook, Twitter and more. We are constantly making improvements on the application. So please make sure to connect with us on Facebook, Twitter or Email with any feature requests or problems. Thank you everyone for making us the #1 Sports Card creator application in the Google Play store!

description: Watch as shining, ever changing star patterns and cloud formations unfold. There is an eye hidden in the galaxies. Once you see the eye, you can’t unsee the eye... You will soon drift away into outer space. Watch the morphing star patterns, while relaxing or meditating. You can enjoy this free version for as long as you want, but the full version has much more features! You can choose the color, size and brightness of the stars. You can also choose the backgrounds, the speed and much more. Battery saving functionality is included in the full version and it has no commercials.

Droid Calendar Widget is a stylish interactive calendar widget that displays events from the Google calendar on your homescreen. Select a day to see all events for that day or add new events right from the widget. You can flip forwards and backwards through the months with the arrow buttons and jump back to the current day with the calendar button. The widget comes with a black and a white base skin and its appearance can be further customized with options including widget opacity, font colors, icon color, today color, selected day color, event color and more. The calendar optionally displays week numbers, and the event time format and starting day of the week can be adjusted. The eventbox under the calendar can be configured to show events up to one month in the future from the currently selected day. #### IMPORTANT NOTICE #### I just received an email with the offer to buy 5-star-ratings for this app. I WON'T buy ratings! If this app has any ratings, you can be sure that those are honest ratings from real users!
release_text: Fix for eventbox opacity setting on Android 4.1 and below.

description: Good morning is an app that includes the best good morning quotes to share with you friends, family or couple. Since there is no better way to begin the day than with a motivational quote that helps start our day on the right foot, we have decided to develop this app featuring the best good morning images. All of them have been exclusively created to be used in this fun app so we hope you like them. Main features: - You’ll find different categories to say “good morning” to your couple, friends or even relatives. - The app can’t be easier to use. Open it and just use the arrows to scroll through images. If there’s an image of your liking, you can share it by pressing the center button. - You can edit the images you like the most by adding your own custom texts. You can choose font size, text location and color as well!. Customize the designs of your liking and give them a personal touch. - The best way to start a day full of energy and enthusiasm is with quotes full of joy and illusion. This is why all images have been created so you can share them with all your friends, relatives or the person you love the most. - This app is highly recommended if you also want to wish a good day to the person you love and want. A “good day my love” or “good day princess” is always the best way to start the day and your couple will be grateful. - You can also download or even add a wallpaper with the designs of your choice. This way you can cheer yourself up in the morning to wake up with more enthusiasm and illusion. - You can add the designs you like the most to “favorites” as we’ve implemented a favorites system so you access them in a faster way. - You can also share these images through any other app installed in your smartphone. You can send them via SMS, email and through any instant messaging program. Also, you can send the messages you like most through any social network. - 100% in English. This app has been created with good morning messages completely in English. We hope you have a lot of fun using this app, as much as we’ve had developing it. If you liked it, we’d be really grateful if you could rate the app positively as this will help and encourage us to keep adding new images and quotes to start the day on the right foot. Legal notice/Disclaimer: All the pictures included in this app have been exclusively created by designers for MuchoApps, therefore, the commercial use of any image within the app is prohibited without the prior consent of MuchoApps. Images from public domain have been used for the photomontages, as they are not identified in any way that states the reserved exploitation of such. Any natural or legal person, who appears to be the owner of any images contained therein, may accredit it via email to info@muchoapps.com , committing ourselves to the immediate withdrawal of the image after verification of the protected photo ownership.

Do you want to control your expenses and be always aware of how much money you have spent and obtained over the past day, week, month or even year? This program will be the best financial assistant for you in this regard. You will always be informed of your financial possibilities. The app will show you, where you can save money and where you can spend more than usual. It is much easier to do this by using categories (food, clothes, car), accounts (cash, bank card, deposit), currencies (dollars, euros, pounds) and transfers (from one account to another). Your details will be securely saved. Daily automatic archiving will not allow you to lose data, and syncing with the cloud will save them, even if the device fails to function. You can set the app logon password, just in case your device is used by others, so you can stop worrying about your data confidentiality. You can easily use the application and you will be able to quickly add new recordings of expenses. The program requires a minimum of time for keeping records; it is easy enough for novices, while it provides rich functionality and a lot of settings for experienced users. One base on different devices. Thanks to the syncing with the cloud, the whole family can use the application. Your phone will inform you of any change in the database with a notification. You can log in to the app using Android, iOS and Blackberry devices or via WEB-interface (browser), following the link “ http://walletsapp.com ”. Forget about past problems of unknown losses and counting money for a long time. Now you have a reliable program that will help you: - Reduce your expenses; - Calculate the total capital in different currencies; - Save your family budget; - Assess your financial possibilities; As our ancestors used to say, money likes to be counted! Therefore, a personal banking system allows you to safely manage any money transactions, look through charts and reports, and sort your incomings and expenses according to different categories. Download the mobile application and do not lose sight of any financial transaction. System capabilities: - Addition of accounts (including multicurrency), categories (and subcategories); - Addition of transactions and remittances (in the same or different currencies); - View of the current exchange rates used in the application; - Syncing with the cloud and other Android, iOS and Blackberry devices; - Export of the selected data to Excel and XML; - Automatic archiving of data with the possibility of recovery; - App logon password; - View of the current funds in the same currency; - Widget to quickly add transactions; - Graphical reports according to the categories, accounts and currencies; - Daily, weekly, monthly and annual reports on the incomings and expenses; - Graphic report on the size of the capital in different currencies for a selected period; - Ability to change the color of the interface, date and time formats; - Log in to the application database via a browser (WEB-version), following the link http://walletsapp.com ; - Built-in calculator. Differences from the free version: - No advertising; - Export of data to Excel and XML. Create your own financial history and always keep up with the flow of your own cash!

description: Tower defense like you’ve never seen it before: crisp, beautiful, addictive, unmatched magic. Elf Defense sets a new standard for the tower defense genre, with gorgeous HD graphics, over 100 enemies to defeat, a sophisticated system of unit recruitment and upgrade, all packaged within an absorbing narrative. Defend the elven homeland against the intrusion of human oppressors. Despite the historical generosity the elves have shown toward their human brethren, the human kingdom has chosen to relentlessly exploit their peaceful friends. Even these peace-loving elves have a breaking point, and it’s been reached as human forces attempt to overrun their very homes. Retina display optimization and unmatched art direction make Elf Defense a pleasure to play; superior game design makes it irresistibly addictive. Metacritic ★★★★★ "Elf Defense proves that tower defense games can still be fun and feel totally original" Gamezebo ★★★★★ "Elf Defense manages to make tried and true mechanics feel new again with its style." Appolicious ★★★★★ "Truly impressive" - iPhoneappcafe ★★★★★ 10/10 Score! "Elf Defense is guaranteed to keep you coming back" - Tapscape ★★★★★ "Retina-display optimized HD graphics in a beautifully bright palette combined with polished animation and superior character design make Elf Defense, hands-down, the best looking castle defense game in the App Store. " - Todaysiphone FEATURES: ▷ Deploy a wide variety of units, each with their own special combat skills, to take down the enemy before they breach your walls! ▷ Over 100 enemy types make strategy a dynamic, evolving challenge ▷ Breathtakingly crisp graphics are put to good use with a gorgeous color palette and exceptional, unique character design ▷ Special items enhance tactics and provide players with the ability to tailor their strategy to suit their own playing style ▷ Adjustable difficulty makes Elf Defense fun for tower defense newbies and veterans alike ▷ Shop is packed with upgrades and items; players can purchase with in-game currency or buy additional currency ▷ GameCenter integration ▷ Gorgeous environments?Fairy Forest, Desolate Desert, Frozen Artic ▷ Collect formidable mercenary warriors to enhance your forces - Elf defense / Elf defence -

description: With the help of application "Sounds of nature" you can dive in the sea world, you can walk on forest paths and listen to the music of rain. Sounds of nature have a salutary influence on us and fight stress. Best qulaity of the sounds! No ads! === The application requires the loading of additional 35 megabytes on the first run. Make sure WiFi is connected. === It's not a secret that lots of living organisms influence each other with the help of sounds. Sounds can be divided into negative ones (we call them noises) and positive ones. Negative sounds can affect our health, and positive ones, on the contrary, have a wholesome effect on us. It has been scientifically proved that nature sounds belong to positive ones. Now we even have a special branch of medicine – sound therapy. The Lite version of the application contains 7 atmospheres: - Summer forest and Сreek - Night forest and Bonfire - Sounds of sea and ocean - Rain and thunder - Countryside - Sea ​​trip - Car and rain Main functions of the application "Sounds of nature. Lite". - Timer - On/off of the different sounds, adjust the volume of any sound - Quality of the sound All our sound atmospheres comprise only natural sounds. It means that if you listen to our sounds of rain, it will be the sounds of real rain. You can check the quality of the sounds at our websute - en.ecosounds.net

description: Cribbage is a card game for two players or up to four, using a standard 52 card pack. Cards rank KQ J10....32A. The objective of the game is for a player to score 121 points before the other and win the game. Before the game starts each player draws a card. The player draws a lower card deals first and each player takes turn to be the dealer in successive hands. The loser of the game is to be the dealer in the next game. The game then proceeds as follow :- 1) The dealer deals 6 cards face down to each player one at a time. The remaining cards are placed face down as stock. 2) Each player discards two cards face down to form the crib. The crib will count for the dealer. Therefore the non-dealer will try to discard two cards to form a crib least valuable to the dealer. 3) The non-dealer cuts a card in the face down stock and place it face up on the top of the stock. The face up card is called the “start” card. If the start card is a Jack, the dealer gains two points. 4) The non-dealer start to place a card from his/her hand face up in front of his/herself. Ace is counted as one, all picture cards are counted as ten, all number cards are counted as their face value. And then each player takes turn to play this step. 5) A player has to stop placing a card face up and say “Go” when all the face up cards of both players add up to 31, or will exceed 31 if to place another card face up. If after placing a card and all the face up cards add up to exactly 31, the player gain two points. 6) A player who cannot place a card since it will exceed 31 has to pass for its opponent to play. If the opponent can neither place a card, the player who places its last card gains one point. All the face up cards are then turned over and placed aside. 7) The opponent of the player who placed the last card repeats playing from step 4. If he or she has no card left on hand, then the other player keeps on playing from step 4 until there is no card on hand. 8) You can gain more points during the play as follow :- 8.1) You gain 2 points if you play a card and the total face up cards add up to 15. 8.2) You gain 2 points if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous face up card ( Pair). 8.3) You gain 6 points if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous pair of face up cards (Pair Royal). 8.4) You gain 12 if you play a card which has the same rank as the previous three face up cards (Double Pair Royal). 8.5) You gain points if you play a card which can form a set of running cards with the previous cards such as you play 7 and the previous two cards are 8 and 6 or 6 and 8. The points gained are equal to the number of running cards in this case 3. And if your opponent plays a card of 9, he/she gains 4 points. 9) When both players have no card on hand, there is another round of scoring points from their played cards combined with the start card. The scoring starts first with the non-dealer according to a set of rules such as :- a) Any combination of card add up to 15 scores 2 point for each combination. For example if your hand has card K Q 5 3 2 the card combinations which add up to 15 are K 5, K 3 2, Q 5, Q 3 2. therefore you gain 8 points. b) Three cards of consecutive rank (irrespective of suit), such as A 2 3, score 3 points for a run. A hand such as 6 7 7 8 scores 12 points:- 3 points of 6 7 x 8 , 3 points from 6 x 7 8, 4 point from x 7 x 8 ( add up 15) and x x 7 8, 2 points from x 7 7 x. 10) Then the dealer scores point from his/her hand similarly as step 9. 11) Finally the dealer displays the four cards in the crib and scores them with the start card. The scoring is similar to step 9.1 to step 9.3. If only all four cards in the crib have the same suit with the start card, then the dealer gain 5 points. 12) As soon as a player's score reaches or exceeds 121 at any stage of the game, he/she wins the game and the game ends.

description: The Loan Calculator helps you to calculate the EMI (Equated monthly Instalment) or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate of home Loan, Car Loan. It also shows loan repayment schedule with total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. Main Features - Loan EMI Calculation - Loan Compare tool to compare 2 different loans - Calculate the affordable loan amount based on the affordable EMI. - Loan Refinance - Loan Repayment Schedule - Calculate EMI or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate by entering other three values. - Total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. - Send SMS - Send Email Message - Send Repayment schedule as email attachment. - Total Amount Paid added - Currency Symbol. - Change start month of Financial Year. - Settings for Default Values - Tenure & Interest Rate, Currency Symbol, Reload Last Values - Customized start month of financial year. Example Loan Amount: 2,500,000 Loan Tenure (Months): 240 Interest Rate (%): 10.5 Total Amount Paid: 5,990,279 Total Interest Paid: 3,490,279 EMI: 24,959 Please send your suggestion and issues to my E-mail address nilesh.harde@gmail.com

description: FINALLY, USE YOUR PHONE OR TABLET LIKE A COMPUTER AND RUN BROWSERS, TEXT EDITORS, MAPS AND MORE SIDE BY SIDE * This is the tablet version, see phone version for SMS support! Multiscreen Multitasking is 10 apps in one. This is the closest you'll get to a Windows 8 style 'desktop mode' on your Android, or to the multitasking features on the S3 or Note 2. This doesn't run any app in a window unfortunately - that's not possible due to the way Android is programmed - but it is the closest alternative. This app includes a unique browser, notepad, drawpad, map and more, and each can be resized and dragged around the screen so you can do more than one thing at once. You can also run a number of web apps including Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, GMail etc. or open widgets in windows too. Best of all? All the apps are interconnected - you can open a website, save it as an image, open it in the drawpad, write on it, then send it to a friend! Feel like you're in Minority Report - tile browsers and read more than one website at once, watch Avengers while reading the news, write an article using Wikipedia as a source, chat on Facebook chat while browsing and listening to music, draw a picture while copying from Google Images, view a place in maps while browsing the web, or open up a text document at the same time as the browser in order to take notes on what you're reading. Create folders to organise your files and edit them on the fly in pop-up windows. Send messages and check your e-mail without needing to stop browsing.... Features Include: * Desktop wallpaper = phone wallpaper * Word count * Spell check * Video player * PDF viewer - 2 PDFs at once! * Browser favourites * Shortcuts on desktop * Edit HTML in text editor and view changes in the browser * View source * Save websites as images and edit them * Easily share drawings/text documents/web links and more * Find on page for browser * Browse and preview files * Edit, cut, rename, delete and create new files with the file manager! * Drawing/doodling pad * Open widgets in windows * Maps * Music player * Find and Replace * Up to three browsers and two editors on screen at once * Resizeable windows * Edit photos and add filters like blur, posterise etc. * Double tap to maximize * Drag to the side to clip to half the screen * Zoom for both browser and text editor * Send e-mails from the editor Many more features are coming soon - please support this app if you want to see camera, games, browser tabs, calculator, spreadsheet, and other functions added more quickly! If you have any requests please get in touch. There are so many cool updates coming, please stick with this app! If you have any suggestions or problems then please E-MAIL me. I am eager to help and to make this app the best it possibly can be, but I need your help and feedback to do so :-)

Belledonne Communications today announced the new release of Linphone for Android. Linphone is an open source internet phone or Voice Over IP phone (VoIP), compatible with the SIP protocol. It was the very first open-source linux application using SIP and it has became one of the most popular open-source SIP dialer for mobile platforms. The new version V2.0 for Android, iPhone and iPad, available immediately, includes significant enhancements in the new ergonomic shape with a curved face interface, the integration of the address book and an account creation assistant. Three major new capabilities have been added : a text messaging feature (chat) with delivery status notification, multiple calls and audio conferencing. In addition, Linphone supports now audio with speex , G711 ,ILBC, GSM, SILK, G722, OPUS, and video with VP8 codec. Exit button is located in the Settings->About page.

The application will be useful to doctors, specialists in statistical accounting treatment institutions, students and residents of medical schools. Employees of LLC "MIR" are happy to help physicians in their daily hard work. * When the project funds were used state support allocated as a grant under c order of the President of the Russian Federation of 17.01.2014 № 11-rp on Based on the competition held by the Company "Knowledge" of Russia

description: Obtén toda la información de tu consumo de internet Telcel en una sola aplicación. Telcel ha desarrollado una aplicación que podrás descargar en tu celular o computadora con la cual podrás saber el consumo de Internet que has realizado de tu Plan de datos o Paquete de Internet que hayas contratado. Esta aplicación te permitirá tener un mayor conocimiento sobre la navegación que realizas ya que podrás saber la cantidad de Megabytes que tienes disponibles en el momento de la consulta. La aplicación Consumo de Internet Telcel muestra la siguiente información: - Nombre del Paquete de Internet contratado. - Una gráfica con el porcentaje de MB Consumidos vs. MB incluidos en su paquete (en el caso de un paquete ilimitado esto es igual a los MB definidos en su Política de Uso Justo). - Los MB incluidos en el Paquete de Internet. - Los MB consumidos al día de la consulta. - Los MB disponibles al día de la consulta. - Fecha y hora de la consulta. - Vigencia del Paquete de Internet. - Seccion Roaming para compra de paquetes y consulta de MB. - Contador en tiempo real de los MB consumidos por el usuario. - Las ubicaciones de Centros de Atención a Clientes y STT. Consideraciones: - La aplicación solo está disponible para usuarios de Planes de Renta Mensual y Paquetes Internet Telcel Amigo y Mixtos. - Esta aplicación solo funciona y puede ser descargada a través de la Red Telcel, no está disponible para redes celulares o Wi-Fi de otros Operadores. Get all the information from your Internet consumption Telcel in one application. Telcel has developed an application that you can download to your phone or computer to which the consumer will know that you have made Internet from your data plan or Internet Package you signed. This application will allow you to have a better understanding of the navigation can perform as Megabytes know how much you have available at the time of the query. The Consumer Internet application Telcel displays the following information: - Package Name hired Internet. - A graph with percent vs. MB Consumed MB included in the package (in the case of an unlimited package that is equal to the MB defined in the Fair Use Policy). - The MB included in the package online. - The MB consumed per day of consultation. - The MB available the day of the consultation. - Date and time of the query. - Effective Package Internet. - Section Roaming for purchasing packages and consulting MB. - Real-time counter of the MB consumed by the user. - The locations of Customer Service Centers and STT. Considerations: - The application is only available for users of Monthly Income Plans and Packages Internet Telcel Amigo and mixed. - This application only works and can be downloaded through the Telcel network, unavailable for cellular networks or other Wi-Fi operators.

description: LogMaster is a travel log(mileage log or Vehicle Log) application for Android. It can be used for tracking travel logs for multiple vehicles and for logging trips. The app is a designed to record travel logs similar to a logbook. LogMaster can select Event description from Google Calendar thus allowing for quick entry of travel log. LogMaster is designed to be easy to use and to record vehicle logs quickly. The vehicle logs can be viewed in the application or can be emailed. Log entry stores Kilometers(Kms)/Miles and the duration.

Calculate Distance, Time, and Pace, Calories Burned, and predictions using Peter Riegel’s formula. Enter in two values from your Distance, Time, Pace and you can use this App to calculate the third. Easily calculate and compare between Miles, Kilometers, Meters, and Yards. Using this information the App will automatically calculate your Speed in MPH and KPH, Calories Burned and your predictions using Peter Riegel’s formula. Additionally each time you press one of the calculate buttons a record of it is stored in your history. This is a great feature as it allows you to keep track of weeks worth of workouts and training plans. The History will record the Date/Time, your Distance, Time, and Pace. To access your history go to the Calculate Tab, press the menu button, and select History. Formulas Used: Calories = Kilograms * Kilometers * 1.036 Peter Riegel’s formula: T2=T1*(D2/D1)^1.06

description: Sculpt a 3D virtual clay ball by pushing and pulling it with your fingers. Many different tools are available for easy modeling : draw, grab, smooth, flatten, paint, symmetry, ... Dare anything thanks to the undo-redo and the standard ".obj" save format. Zoom and pan with two fingers. Imagine something, sculpt it, and share with others. You'll enjoy this simplified tactile modeling experience inspired by the sculpture mode of Blender and ZBrush. Look at them if you want to get more serious. Last but not least, this sofware is free, open source, and without any annoying ad ! If you want to improve it, feel free to join the project.

description: Race, stunt and fight your way across America on your motorcycle. Play as one of the Adrenaline Crew, sport bike, cop or chopper rider as you gain points completing stunts and finishing first! +++ONLY PEOPLE RATING THIS 1 STAR ARE USING OLD VERSIONS, UPGRADE YOUR VERSION+++ "One of the best games for 2012" The Washington Post "Road Rash on Steroids" Gamer Online Magazine "If it wasn't for this game I would probably get a lot of work done!" Kenny Kelley From the #1 selling 'Adrenaline Crew' platinum motorcycle mayhem DVD series we come to you now as digital anarchy... HOW TO PLAY - Tilt your phone/tablet to steer left and right - Stay away from cars, curbs, and cops -Tap ATTACK to punch and kick other players off their bikes and get Stunt Bonuses - Tap the Stunt button to wheelie and perform other special stunts - Pick up Nitro's to earn an extra boost. - Tap break to avoid wrecks and sticky situations, bike will automatically do an endo! FEATURES * Adrenaline filled addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls * Over 10 different characters to unlock and play, each with their own unique abilities, speed and gameplay! * Real stunts the Adrenaline Crew performs on the streets across America * Gain points by holding stunts while being attacked by other riders. * Lifelike character animations and physics * Play with Game Center and add your score to the Leader Boards and unlock achievements! * Facebook integration: compete with your friends for top score and post brags to your wall * Awesome realistic sound effects recorded from real motorcycles, including a sport bike, chopper, dirt bike, and a cafe racer! BONUS TIPS - Save up your Nitro to use in sticky situations like running away from other bikers attacking you - Concentrate on coming in first and just fending off those who attack you - Hit Nitro then Stunt button so you can get extra speed while doing a stunt - If being attacked on the side that a cop is shooting radar don't hit the rider off till you pass the cop, he will go after the other guy instead!
release_text: Updated for all new phones! Read changes below. Changes: *NO ADS * Updated for graphics cards on new phones. * New control system. * All characters of Adrenaline Crew to choose from! * Unlock all bikes or levels with one click! * New Menu buttons and layout for all phones * Added Traffic for higher levels of difficulty. * Added Adrenaline Crew's DVD Trailers * New Sound effects for better game play * Faster speeds for all riders

description: Android Defender Defender is a fresh modern remake of the top rated classic arcade game DEFENDER. Taken to a new level of fighting off waves of Aliens to defend Android Astronauts from being captured into outer space, this deep space game will test your hand eye coordination and vigilant skills to save astronauts from power-starving aliens! YOUR MISSION: To defend all astronauts by destroying aliens launched out to seize all life form. Each Alien is solely after Android astronauts which by capturing, expands their advancing powers to support them imprison additional astronauts. As the Aliens advance to more powerful forces they ruthlessly attack your ship for interrupting their abduction operations. If you fall short of defending astronauts while protecting yourself from aliens…GAME OVER! Be sure to visit our Facebook page and leave comments suggestions and tips and tricks! be sure to use the tuning options to make the game play the way you want it to. Pinch the screen above the controls to set the zoom level! Is REALLY awesome on tablets! www.facebook.com/AndroidDefender

description: Aplikasi ini merupakan sebuha aplikasi android untuk pembelajaran mobile learning pada materi fisika SMA pokok bahasan alat-alat optik. Aplikasi ini terdiri dari 3 jenjang pendidikan pada pokok bahasan yang sama, yaitu: SD (cahaya). SMP (Pemantulan dan pembiasan), dan SMA (Alat-alat Optik). Aplikasi ini dibuat sebagai media pendukung proses pembelajaran fisika di sekolah untuk memfasilitasi siswa belajar dimana saja dan kapan saja. This application is an android app for learning sebuha mobile learning in high school physics subject matter optical instruments. This application consists of 3 levels on the same subject, namely: SD (light). SMP (reflection and refraction), and SMA (Optical Equipment). This application was made as the physical media supporting the learning process in schools to facilitate student learning anywhere and anytime.

The animated biology app for children 2 years and up With this charming and simple app, children are able to learn about animals, plants and the climate. Based on an entirely intuitive design, children gain their first experiences with biospheres, food chains and animal reproduction. The basics for understanding different eco-systems are communicated in a playful way. BioMio is perfect for parents who would like to raise their child’s awareness at an early age to the processes of nature and basic aspects of biology without overwhelming children with text or complicated graphics. This app is easy to use: children immerse themselves in three different landscapes and make different animals and plants come to life by simply touching them on the screen. The representations also depict subterranean and underwater environments making this app particularly interesting and appealing. Each landscape offers an automatic detail enlargement function enabling even the smallest of animals to be easily recognized and well-defined. The following environments may be experienced: The River Landscape and the Tree The squirrel, woodpecker, bark beetle and bees live in this biotope. The rabbit and the mouse have their underground tunnels, their young tucked away in their home shelters. A buzzard chases after a mouse and feeds its young - freshly hatching out of their eggs. Even the snake is quick to have eyes for the little mouse. The bear attempts to catch fish from the river while the hedgehog tugs on a rain worm. A bud sprouts from an acorn and mushrooms pop up out of the ground. Tap on the clouds and rain begins to pour down. The Forest and the Pond In this biotope we find the hedgehog and the rabbit and the fo x with its young in their shelters. There is also the hungry deer and the owl. The frog in the pond snatches a dragon fly. Meanwhile, the mother duck teaches her offspring to swim. The spider spins its web. Under water, the fish and newt tumble and swim; a water lily grows and blossoms. Tap on the clouds in this environment and snowflakes begin to fall over the mountaintops. The Sea and Underwater World The fish, the sea horse, jellyfish, octopus, sea urchin, molluscs and the large, greedy shark dwell in this busy biotope. The seagull and the seal snatch a fish. A fish swallows a snail. The turtle lays its eggs in the sand and the crabs have a little quarrel. The seal family sun themselves on an island and splash around in the sea. Tap on the sun and watch the water evaporate to form little clouds. Have fun in the land of BioMio!

Welcome to Bottle Rocket! Bottle Rocket is an addictive, arcade style game where you're in control of a fizz propelled bottle. Simply pick your level, your bottle and your flavour and off you go! Dodge everything from beach balls to meteors as you aim for the sky. All you have to do is tilt your device to avoid oncoming danger but as you play, your pressure bar drains so collect any energy cans you see to replenish your bar. As you play, your points are turned into experience, get enough and you level up! Level ups reward you with new levels, new bottles and new flavours to choose from! Each bottle you unlock has their own unique stats so if you like dodging, there's a bottle for you. If you like hitting everything, there's a bottle for you! And if you like a challenge, there's a bottle for you too! Key features include: * Loads of levels to unlock! * Loads of bottles! * Loads of flavours! * Local highscore board! * Achievements to unlock! * Trophies to unlock! * Addictive soundtrack! Have fun and happy Bottle Rocketing! Please note: This application requires Adobe Air to be installed.

description: Start your mysterious afterlife journey to pass through the underworld realm of Osiris The Favorite Pastime Of The Pharaoh Tutankhamun. The Artifact Of The World's Oldest Board Game Found In King Tut's Tomb, Beside The Golden Coffin & Sarcophagus. ==== Awards ==== ◆ Nominated for Top 20 Apps in Mobily KSA Developers Award 2014. ◆ Nominated for the World Summit Award 2013 in e-Entertainment & Games from Egypt. ◆ Silver Winner in 2013 W3 Awards. ◆ 1st Place Winner Of Egypt e-Content Award 2013. ◆ Winner Of Gaming Egypt Contest 2012. After performing opening of the mouth ceremony on your mummy by Anubis, you start your afterlife journey protected by Eye of Horus(Wadjet) to pass through the underworld realm of Osiris, challenging an invisible adversary inside an Egyptian hidden tomb in The Valley of the Queens located near the better known Valley of the Kings, on the west bank of the Nile river across from Thebes (Luxor) Senet is a board game from predynastic and ancient Egypt, it is the earliest known record of a backgammon , checkers and chess like games. The oldest hieroglyph representing a Senet game dates to around 3500 BC.The full name of the game in Egyptian was meaning "The game of passing". Games have been around for thousands of years, but none are older than the ancient game of Senet, invented by the Egyptians roughly 3500 or 5000 years ago. It is believed that this two-player board game originated as a popular form of recreation with both royalty and peasantry. But by the mid-13th century BC, Senet had evolved into a more religious ritual. Some depictions from this time period forward show the game being played not by two people, but rather as a deceased player competing against an invisible adversary, interpreted by some to symbolize the deceased players own soul. The board has become a metaphor for the afterlife with pawns moving across the board just as a soul moves through layers of the netherworld after death. Reaching the final space and leaving the board is the goal of the game, just as reaching Horus and leaving the netherworld was the goal for the Egyptians after their death for attaining rebirth with the gods Isis & Osiris, Sekhmet & Bastet holding the Egyptian Ankh or the papyrus scepter. The game board consists of 30 squares, arranged in 3 horizontal rows of 10. Pawns move from left to right through row 1, then drop down and move from right to left through row 2. Dropping down again, pawns move from left to right along row 3 and finally, off the board. The game uses the rules developed by Timothy Kendall in his 1978 work, Passing Through the Netherworld :The Meaning and Play of Senet, an Ancient Egyptian Funerary Game. The game includes five special squares, governed by their own rules, each containing a hieroglyphic. Square 15 is the House of Rebirth; square 26 is the House of Beauty; square 27 is the House of Water: square 28 is the House of the Three Truths; square 29 is the House of Two Truths; and square 30, the last, is the House of Horus, the Egyptian falcon-god and lord of the sky. Egyptian Senet is a challenging game that combines luck and strategy, features authentic photos of ancient Egyptian temples, plus artistically crafted graphics and animation of an ancient stone game board and pieces, set in an echoing, tomb-like chamber. Ritualistic music plus sound effects of stone pieces moving recreate the atmosphere of predynastic Egypt.The App's Icon shows the Egyptian Queen Nefertari playing Senet in her tomb, she was the great wife of the pharaoh Ramesses II (Ramses). Also many Egyptian Queens have a similar photos playing Senet such as Nefertiti the the great royal wife of Akhenaten,and the Queen Hatshepsut the wife of Thutmose II. Recommended for everyone interested in Egyptology and Archeology Supported Languages: (English Arabic French Spanish German Italian Dutch Russian Japanese Korean Chinese Portuguese-Brazil) For More Info: Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/EgyptianSenet

description: At the touch of your fingertip, you will be able to make any cramped elevator instantly more uncomfortable. George Lowe Bites includes categories for... * Putting the smack down while GAMING! * ...at the Job! * DE-Motivational Speeches * Evil Products * Ninjas & Pirates * Quotes * Really, um, special... Sound FX * Superhuman and utterly bizarre stuff! ALSO! Use the George Lowe Bites Magic 8-Ball to make important life changing decisions*. WHO IS GEORGE LOWE? Best known as the voice of Space Ghost, George Lowe has been heard in the TV shows Aqua Teen Hunger Force, The Brak show, Robot Chicken, Perfect Hair Forever and other Adult Swim Series and in the online games AdventureQuest Worlds, DragonFable, MechQuest and EpicDuel. Découvre les périodes et événements les plus importants de l'histoire de l'humanité! Une appli pédagogique pour développer sa connaissance et compréhension de l'histoire. Aussi disponible sur ipad ( http://bit.ly/1aNx1aX ) et tablettes Kindle ( http://amzn.to/19ZZwO0 ) - Au début .. La Terre et le système solaire - La préhistoire - L'Egypte antique - Les Grecs de l'Antiquité - Les Romains - L'Europe médiévale - Les grands aventuriers de la Renaissance - Le siècle des Lumières - La Révolution Française - La Révolution industrielle - La premiere guerre mondiale - La seconde guerre mondiale - On a marché sur la lune Une application passionnante qui va développer la curiosité de votre enfant. Une frise chronologique interactive permet à l'enfant de se déplacer d'avant en arrière dans le temps. Les périodes historiques sont organisées thématiquement et chronologiquement de la préhistoire jusqu'a nos jours. Cette application vise à: - Développer la connaissance et la compréhension de l'histoire. - Arriver à se situer dans une chronologie historique. - Fournir des faits, dates et événements clés pour consolider l'apprentissage en classe. Image Hunt is a fun brain tantalizing game for all ages that teaches you about health and wellness! Let’s get our learning on! Identify the 5 differences between two images. Tap on the right image to confirm. Select from 3 difficulty levels Easy – Medium – Hard. You start with 1 game and when you finish another game unlocks. Each level consists of 15 different games. You can enjoy an endless level once it’s unlocked. You want to find the 5 differences before you run out of the allocated time or lives.

description: Duuuuude… It’s time to save the known universe with the Guardians of the Galaxy by your side! Join Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Gamora and Drax in an OFFICIAL Marvel Studios Live Wallpaper experience… Meet the lovable leader Star-Lord and his rowdy crew: Rocket, an alien raccoon – quick to anger and quick to draw; Groot, Rocket’s trusty friend and ally; Gamora the mysterious assassin; and the vengeance seeking Drax the Destroyer. Download the free version of the Guardians of the Galaxy Live Wallpaper, based on the Marvel Studios movie, featuring the team’s spaceship, The Milano. Pay close attention to The Milano’s exhaust which doubles as a battery gauge for your Android device! Swipe and watch as it shoots and flickers with green light when your device’s battery is full and then gradually dims and turns red as your power depletes. When your device gets close to zero power your free battery gauge will flash red and The Milano’s exhaust will begin to sputter, reminding you to “fill the tank”! “I am Groot.” – Groot If that isn’t enough Guardians action for you, than an upgrade is in order via several unlockable premium options. You can unlock the premium version of the Live Wallpaper featuring the full team line-up with interactive stat displays for each character. Once unlocked and onscreen, you can tap any member of the team to view their stats and hear some audio clips inspired by the movie. Also, to help you over-come any potential threats to the known universe, the Guardians of the Galaxy Live Wallpaper will deliver you email, missed call and text alerts in the form of an over-lay covering your home screen! If you’re feeling like a casualty of wasted time, unlock the premium Clock Widget, which features the day, time and local weather, as well as a voice inspired by the cranky, (albeit hilarious), Rocket! Hear the lil’ ace shot recite the time for you as well as little surprises here and there for you to discover while the Guardians of the Galaxy Clock Widget is set to your home screen. Are you ready to protect the galaxy and your Android device? Then unlock the Sticker Widget pack and place the Guardians of the Galaxy anywhere on your home screen! (All 5 members of the team represented – Star-Lord, Rocket, Groot, Gamora and Drax!) Still feel like you need more help with saving the galaxy..? There are unlockable premium phone contact avatars and utilities, like a flashlight, calculator and mirror so you can always find the keys, tally the tip and do your make-up before battle! Even the most deranged villain in the universe isn’t going to be able to stand up to the super strength this app wields, making your Android phone or tablet the most heroic device around. The whole galaxy’s going to be watching, (and downloading), Guardians of the Galaxy… Don’t miss out on the excitement; download today! Fully optimized for devices and tablets. Guardians of the Galaxy Live Wallpaper uses READ_SMS and READ_CALL_LOGS to enable the crew to help you stay up-to-date with all of your device’s incoming texts and missed calls. If you have unlocked the app’s premium options, the Guardians of the Galaxy Live Wallpaper will deliver animated alerts for both new texts and missed calls directly on your home screen! description: 읽기만 하는 반야심경은 그만~! 대승불교 반야사상의 핵심을 담은 반야심경은 우리나라에서 가장 널리 독송되는 불경입니다. 반야심경을 외우는 것 보다 보살님이 직접 목탁을 연주하면서 소리내어 읊는다면 보다 재미있고 쉽게 외울 수 있습니다! 설정을 통해서 소리, 진동 on/off, 글자크기, 글자색상까지 수정할 수 있어서 남녀노소 누구나 쉽게 이용할 수 있습니다. 한국불교의 모든 의식 때 반드시 독송되는 반야심경, 이 어플을 가지고 계신다면 반드시 도움이 될 것 입니다. ^^ Heart Sutra is enough to read! Mahayana sutra containing the core ideas of Buddhism Wisdom is the most widely doksong disrespect in our country. If rather than memorizing Bodhi Heart Sutra it recites aloud while playing the gong yourself, you can more easily remembered than fun! Through sound settings, vibration on / off, to be able to modify font size, font color, it can easily take advantage of all ages. When all the ordinances of the Korea Buddhist sutra must be doksong, If you have this app it will surely be helpful. ^^

description: For bird family tickers, and a world species checklist. Following IOC 3.1, lists 233 bird families and 10,451 bird species. Tick the birds and bird families you have seen with instant statistics display, or save the listing to a file on the SD card. For users of the Birding Checklist applications (WP, US, Australian, NZ, EPB) there is an import facility which will read your lifelist and tick the species accordingly. There is also a trial version, with the same number of bird families and species, but lacking the Import, Find and Report functions. Try out the trial version first - your ticks will be saved and read if/when you upgrade to the full version.
release_text: Fixed a nasty bug which can result in all user entered data being lost on phones relying on an SD card that can be connected to a PC as USB mass storage (ie not MTP). Application now creates a backup of families and species files on SD card before over-writing with latest backup.

description: ADW-Theme Breast Cancer Care Added TAB support. Short story: Please watch youtube video on how to use the Theme. Long Story: It is an ADW-THEME which requires ADW-LAUNCHER application installed. There is a free version of ADW-launcher on the Market. The ADW-theme includes two wallpapers, clock and icon package. After installation of the Theme please press button "Open". It will forward you to the Market to download and install free version of the ADW launcher provided it is not already installed. To Use the Theme: Start ADW-launcher. Press Menu, choose ADW Settings and then Themes Preferences. Choose the Theme and apply it. Long press on any application icon on your desktop. "Custom shortcut" menu will popup. Press on the icon picture once more, then select ADWTheme icon pack, and choose any icon you like for your application. To Change the Wallpaper: Long press on the desktop, choose "Wallpapers" and then the Themes wallpaper. Scroll among two wallpapers, select and press "Set wallpaper". To Open the Clock: Long press the desktop, choose "Widgets" and then the Themes clock It is still very useful to watch youtube video about the Theme. Remark: On small screens with low and medium resolutions one has to reload wallpaper to fit the home screen.

핫딜쇼핑포털, 다함께 쿠차차! (랭키 5년 연속 1위 쿠폰차트) "너무 좋아요. 노래로 표현하자면 없는게 없답니다." 이명*님 "한눈에 가격비교되서 잘쓰고있어요. 다른곳 안들어가고 바로 여기서 비교하고 삽니다. 너무 좋아요♥" 박정*님 "넘 좋아요. 여러군데 들어갈 필요없이 쿠차에서 모든것이 해결이 되니까 넘 좋아요." 김규*님 1. 이 앱 저 앱 필요없고 쿠차에서 핫딜가격비교 내가 사고싶은 상품, 어느 쇼핑몰이 제일 저렴할까요? 쿠차에서 검색하면 최저가 핫딜을 한 눈에 볼 수 있어요. 2. 자주 가는 쇼핑몰을 쿠차에서 자동로그인 맘에 드는 상품 결제할 때, 매번 로그인할 필요 없어요. 몇번의 클릭으로 편리하게 주문, 배송조회까지 되는 놀라운 기능을 이용해 보세요. 3. '최저가핫딜', '꿀핫딜'.. 쿠차 MD가 찾아낸 숨은 핫딜 만나기 매일 업데이트 되는 쇼핑몰 상품들, 쿠차 MD가 꼼꼼히 보고 엄선한 핫딜만 모아서 운영하고 있어요. 4. 돈버는앱 쿠차슬라이드 빠르게 적립되는 돈버는 어플 쿠차슬라이드 돈도 벌고 쇼핑도 하는 쿠차만의 리워드앱 ======================================= [쿠차 어플 주요 기능] 1. 대한민국 모든 핫딜쇼핑 상품을 모아서 핫딜검색, 핫딜가격비교! - 모바일에 최적화된 핫딜검색, 핫딜가격비교 서비스 제공 2. 오늘의 핫딜쇼핑 인기순위 차트 제공 - 오늘의 핫딜 상품을 가장 많이 구매하고 찾는 인기순위 차트로 확인할 수 있습니다. - 내가 찾는 품목의 가장 인기있고 싼 핫딜을, 가장 빠르게 찾을 수 있습니다. 3. 모바일 핫딜쇼핑에 최적화된 서비스 개발 - 한방에 자동로그인: 쇼핑몰 계정을 쿠차에 연결하면 자동으로 로그인되요! - 모바일쇼핑에 최적화된 쿠차 자체 웹브라우저 적용 - 내 주변 핫딜: 내 주변 인기 맛집, 미용실, 마사지샵을 거리순/인기순으로 찾으세요. Ecuador-Peru-Bolivia Birding Checklist demo version This is one of a series of Birding Checklist applications for Android mobile phones and tablets. There are applications for Australia, New Zealand, United States (excluding Mexico and South America), Western Palearctic (UK and Europe), Pacific Islands, South Africa, and Ecuador/Peru/Bolivia. PHOTOS & SOUNDS are downloaded separately, and must be manually installed via your PC. Please check the Readme file at this download website so you know how to do this. The photos and sounds are NOT included in the download package from the Android market. Although this is still a Demo version there is full functionality pending completion of information and resource files for all species. There is currently a good collection (868 photos, 468 sound files) for the birds of North Peru, plus Quick Lists for that region. EPB download website: https://drivehq.com/folder/p9274039.aspx Ecuador 1615 species, Peru 1752 species, Bolivia 1386 species, Galapagos 157 species These applications include basic bird identification information, and are NOT intended to replace a field guide. It is expected that users will have good familiarity with the birds they are seeing, and will use this application for: a. Logging bird sightings (with GPS co-ordinates if your phone has a GPS) b. Uploading your sightings to eBird (or similar PC or online recording system) c. Maintaining your Lifelist Full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets Demo versions have reduced functionality: - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files – the application places no restriction on this but very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Please contact me if you have any comments or suggestions, or corrections to the bird information. Please also get in contact if you are interested in helping create a new birding checklist application for birds in your area.

description: This APP will enable you to email (or) upload your text messages. "How do I get a baby to sleep" is a question that will never pop in your mind again! Your heart may swell with love when you watch your baby sleeping. She looks so sweet and innocent. Your heart may race however, when you can’t get her to stay asleep all night or at times when you really want her to. Don't worry – 'French Lullabies' are here to solve your problems! Just play 'Frère Jacques' or “Au clair de la Lune” on your mobile phone every night and watch your baby falls into a deep slumber in no time. A crying baby sound will remain just an unpleasant memory for all parents. Lullabies are often sung by parents in calming babies, putting them to sleep, or simply spending time with them. The simple lyrics, nature, and storyline of lullabies are usually intended for children, and are therefore suitable for them. A parent can rock a child to sleep with a lullaby, calm a discontented child, or sing along with a playing child. Instrumental lullaby songs for babies are also good because the rhythm and the soothing sounds make them sleep longer, thus they are well rested. There are other types of lullabies which we are used to but instrumental lullabies are the best for babies. Download French Lullabies for your mobile phone and your kids will love these calming and soothing sounds to sleep to. 'Fais dodo' is probably one of the best French good night songs for kids. Play this baby lullaby to your kids every night and they will adore it. Children benefit emotionally when they and their primary caregiver have an opportunity to focus on one another. Lullabies for babies allow the singer to express her love to the child on a very intimate level and the child can focus on the singer in a peaceful and undistracted manner. Singing also provides comfort and reassurance to babies. Music in itself is calming but music coming from the primary caregiver can stop a baby from crying, and can sometimes comfort them even when they are the most distraught. NZ Birding Checklist full version This is one of a series of Birding Checklist applications for Android mobile phones and tablets. There are applications for Australia, New Zealand, United States (excluding Mexico and South America), Western Palearctic (UK and Europe), Pacific Islands, South Africa, and Ecuador/Peru/Bolivia. PHOTOS & SOUNDS are downloaded separately, and must be manually installed via your PC. Please check the Readme file at this download website so you know how to do this. The photos and sounds are NOT included in the download package from the Android market. It is recommended that you test the download and install process with the demo version first, then upgrade to the full version when you have confirmed that it is working. *** If you are having problems please email me (contact details in the About window in the application). I am unable to respond to comments or questions in the market reviews. NZ Download website: https://drivehq.com/folder/p8328472.aspx NZ and Norfolk Island – 396 species and 67 subspecies These applications include basic bird identification information, and are NOT intended to replace a field guide. It is expected that users will have good familiarity with the birds they are seeing, and will use this application for: a. Logging bird sightings (with GPS co-ordinates if your phone has a GPS) b. Uploading your sightings to eBird (or similar PC or online recording system) c. Maintaining your Lifelist Full versions have the following features: - complete listing of all bird species and subspecies (where known) - searching and filtering of the bird list - statistics and record of your personal bird Lifelist - current tick list (birds you have seen today or during a short field trip) - quick lists for customised bird listings for locations your frequently visit - display of bird photos and bird calls on the SD card linked to the application (these must be manually downloaded separately) - logging facilities including GPS location (if your phone has a GPS) - export log file in eBird Import format for rapid loading of your sightings to eBird - optional downloadable Rangemaps and extended text descriptions (incomplete but growing collection on external download site) - help information - play mp4 videos of birds stored in the photos folder on the SD card - support for large screen 1280 x 800 tablets Demo versions have reduced functionality (there is no longer a demo version of the NZ Birding Checklist: - cannot save lifelist, sighting logs or statistics - will not display rangemaps or extended descriptions - do not display ticklists for regions - no GPS location display on Google maps - no alternate language support - no quicklists (custom filtering of bird lists for your location) - no mp4 video support You can easily add your own resources files – the application places no restriction on this but very large numbers of photos (many thousands) may slow down the application. Please contact me if you have any comments or suggestions, or corrections to the bird information.

News summary apps are the new hotness. Summly is great but only gives you content from Yahoo. Wavii was awesome, but Google shut it down. Building on the success of TLDR, Plexi Digest takes all the day's news, as it happens, and shrinks it for pocket-sized reads. With PlexiDigest you get breaking news in 8 categories, pulled as it happens from leading sources like: BBC, CNN, Fox News, Sports Illustrated, Reuters, Gizmodo, TechCrunch, Mashable, Engadget, The Verge, New York Times, and many more. Articles always current are never more than a few hours hold. Summaries are often accompanied by photos from the source story, and you can click through to read the full article of any story. Don't settle for apps that pick selectively from yesterday's news or wait for your Facebook friends to decide what's happening, get the news from the source, live and in real-time with PlexiDigest. Beta Version 0.3 Features: • Get dozens of up-to-the-minute headlines from each of 8 news categories, each with multiple sources. • News categories are; US News, Global News, Business, Sports, Technology & Science, Lifestyle, Entertainment, and Politics. • Fast, intuitive interface, just swipe to quickly navigate news summaries. • Tap the summary headline to read the full story on the source web site. • Share fast-breaking news stories and summaries via Facebook, Twitter, email, text message, and more. • Fast-loading news brings more than 130 stories and summaries in just seconds on 4G connections. All this in a beautiful and efficient interface that places the priority where it should be; the information you need right now. Beta Version 0.3.1 Updates: Improved performance of transitions between news summaries on older versions of Android (Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean), and lower-quality hardware. Improved loading of first news summary. Beta 0.3.3 Updates Vast improvement on all devices running Android 4.0.x - 4.2.x. Beta 0.3.5 Updates Fixed font but for 4.0.x devices Expanded time window for more stories in each category Beta 0.3.6 Updates Even more stories in each category

description: This interactive i-book is designed and created for higher grade Physics students. Since this topic is also taught in chemistry so it will help the students enrolled in chemistry course as well. Sign convention is particularly needed to understand, to differentiate the outcome of a solution in Physics and Chemistry. Starting with basic definitions of system, surroundings, state of a system, process etc. It covers Zeroth law and the First Law of Thermodynamics. Derivation and graphical representation under different thermodynamic processes are discussed well with the help of rich visuals and audio. Mind Map, Solved examples, Interactive activities and printable worksheet make the learning cycle complete. This app helps to understand the concept of thermodynamics to grade 11 and grade 12 children in an easy way. Broadly Thermodynamics is concerned with heat and its relation to energy and work. It defines macroscopic variables that characterize materials and radiation, and explains how they are related and by what laws they change with time. The average behavior of very large numbers of microscopic constituents is described with the help thermodynamics. In the words of Lord Kelvin: Thermodynamic is the subject of the relation of heat to the forces acting between contiguous parts of bodies, and the relation of heat to electrical agency.

Bayyinah’s mission is to make the appreciation of Islam’s sacred texts accessible to the world. For us, the accomplishment of this mission means that we must excel in providing education and resources in two areas; (i) Arabic studies and (ii) linguistic and literary analysis of sacred Islamic texts. We believe that Muslims have the right to education in both of these areas that should be innovative, easy, affordable and accessible. We are far from accomplishing our mission and yet we are ever grateful to have made tremendous strides along this blessed journey already. We are more excited and driven than ever before to make this organization a vehicle to serve the masses of Muslims and non-Muslims. Our free library is a life-long partnership between our two lead instructors, Nouman Ali Khan and AbdulNasir Jangda. They hope to complete a thorough literary study of the entire Qur’an over the next several years. The library is updated every week and has already become one of Bayyinah’s most appreciated services.

description: The Auscultation Primer app presents auscultation of various heart sounds as they relate to the anatomy, physiology, and diagnosis of cardiovascular disease. It's perfect for physicians, medical students, nurses, and other clinicians who wish to improve their auscultation skills.The app includes 10 cases of live patient recordings among which are some of the most common sounds and murmurs. Each video recording includes audio plus a phonocardiogram and ekg tracing for timing. Additionally, descriptive text is provided to assist in the learning experience.

description: 버키노트(Buckie note)는 머릿속에만 간직하고 있던 꿈(버킷)의 실현을 후원하는 소셜 네트워크 서비스(SNS)입니다. 전 세계 70억 명의 사람들과 꿈을 나누고, 유용한 정보들을 공유하고, 꿈을 이루는 데 필요한 코칭과 후원을 받을 수 있습니다. 이제 버키노트에서 버킷리스트(Bucket list)를 작성하고, 소중한 꿈을 이루어보세요. 여러분의 참여가 늘어날수록 꿈이 실현될 가능성이 더욱 높아집니다! - 나의 드림메이트, 버키노트 소개 - 1. 버킷 버킷리스트를 작성하고 버킷 달성을 위한 ‘드림레시피(Dream recipe)’를 만들어 나의 꿈을 한 단계씩 이루어 갈 수 있도록 체계적으로 관리할 수 있습니다. 또한 버킷에 태그(tag)를 등록하여 꿈 실현에 유용한 정보들을 모아 볼 수 있습니다. 2. 소식 비슷한 버킷을 가진 친구들을 팔로우하여 서로의 꿈에 응원과 댓글을 남기고, 포인트로 꿈을 후원(서비스 예정)하고, 도움이 되는 정보들을 얻을 수 있습니다. 3. 모임 나와 같은 꿈을 이루고 싶은 사람들끼리 '모임'을 만들어 서로 꿈에 대한 이야기를 나누고 정보도 공유할 수 있는 공간입니다. 혼자 꿈을 이루는데 외로우셨던 분들, 꿈에 대한 정보가 필요한 분들 등등 모임에서 함께 꿈을 실현해 갈 수 있습니다. ★ 버키노트는 대한민국 대표 꿈쟁이 “김수영 작가”와 함께 합니다. ‘멈추지 마, 다시 꿈부터 써봐’, ‘당신의 꿈은 무엇입니까’의 저자이며 우리에게 ‘골든벨 소녀’로 알려진 베스트셀러 작가 김수영씨가 버키노트 서비스의 공식 드림멘토로써 여러분의 꿈 실현을 위해 활동하게 됩니다. 보다 자세한 소개는 포털 사이트 검색창에서 ‘김수영 작가’를 검색해보세요. ★ 버키노트 서비스는 웹에서도 이용 가능합니다. 이제 PC에서 버키노트 서비스를 만나보세요! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 버키노트가 더 많은 이들과 함께 꿈을 이뤄갈 수 있도록 여러분의 의견을 제안해주세요! • 공식 홈페이지: www.buckienote.com • 문의사항: help@oncompany.co.kr • 버키노트 페이스북 www.facebook.com/buckienote • 버키노트 트위터 www.twitter.com/buckienote * 키워드: 새해, 새해소망, 결심, 꿈, 도우미, 모임, 독서, 다이어트, SBS, 금연, 목표, 응원, 여행, 계획, 일정, 할일, To-Do, 플랜, 공부, 솜노트, 솜투두, 김수영, 드림멘토, 멘토 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 821045827331

This is what happens to your idea after you get the business idea. - What to do if you have too many business ideas and how to choose the best idea - Common business idea mistakes - Protecting business ideas after you get the business ideas, and whether you should protect them at all For the low price of the app, you can get live confidential feedback and advice about your business ideas. description: The creators of Little Britain bring to you ‘Come Fly With Me Holiday Snaps’. Now you can have your picture taken with your favourite characters from the popular BBC series by simply snapping away or editing photos already on your device. You can resize, flip and place the characters wherever you like. Once you’re done, save them to your Holiday Snaps gallery and build up a collection of fun photos or share them with your friends via email, Facebook and Twitter to unlock hilarious video clips and sound bites. The app features a selection of popular video clips and soundbites from the first series. Now you can see and hear Taaj, Precious and Moses wherever you go! You get me? Please note this app requires access to your address book to allow you to share your snaps.

description: Notice !!!!- You must download adobe reader for your device. If you do not download adobe reader than you will not be able to see most of the documents. Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad, android, tablets and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. Chem Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Chemistry. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. Chem Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning chemistry but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for the chemistry regents exam and learn chemistry. 1.This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2.Regents interactive Fun quizzes by topic (with real regents questions) 3.Daily Chemistry and science news updates. 4. Regents exams with the key. 5. Fun videos from youtube. 6. Flash cards by topic. This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a regents or to present a lesson. All the regents buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release. Topics Include * Math Fundamentals * Atom * Periodic Table * Moles and Stoichiometry * Chemical Bonding * Physical Behavior of Matter * Kinetics and Equilibrium * Organic Chemistry * Oxidation-Reduction * Acids, Bases and Salts * Nuclear Chemistry
