description: ★ NEW → Add-on app: FlipClock Designer (FREE in PRO version) ★ NEW → WEATHER RADARS ★ NEW → WEATHER MAPS ZOOM ★ NEW → GEOGRAPHICAL MAP OF LOCATIONS ★ NEW → ADD ANY LOCATION ON EARTH FROM MAP, CUSTOM LOCATION NAME ★ NEW → WEATHER ALERTS ★ NEW → HOURLY FORECASTS AND DETAILED CHARTS incl CLOUDINESS ★ NEW → WEATHER ICON PACKS (install Weather Services Iconpack add-on application first) ★ NEW → METEOGRAM and CHART CHIDGET (all in one chart also in desktoop widget) For more details, check our new website: http://www.android-weather.com Get the latest current conditions, forecasts, weather charts, forecast maps, webcams and more with largest network of professional weather stations all over the world in a great looking style! FEATURES, or what makes this a FULL PACKAGE: ====================================== ◆ CORE FUNCTIONALITY: - Live and detailed local weather conditions and forecasts - HOURLY weather data including details as Cloudiness, Humidity, Feels like, Air pressure, Wind, % chance of rain and precipitation - Millions! of locations around the world - Exact dynamic and automated current location search with 'My Location' functionality - 8 desktop weather widgets with (Flip Clock I & II 4x2, Forecast 4x2, Large 4x2, Forecast 4x1, Clock 4x1, Mini 1x1, Chart widget) - Notification bar icon witch temperature and weather details - Weather alerts in USA - Up to 10 active locations - Geographical map of locations ◆ COOL FEATURES: - Live Webcams for every location to see the real weather conditions (largest webcams network) - Forecast Charts for Temperature, Precipitation, Humidity, Cloudiness - Weather Forecast Maps for precipitation, clouds, temperatures and wind (also in HD available)** - Choose weather data provider which fits your location best (OpenWeatherMap or YR.NO) - Dual Clock – select from System, GMT or Location time - Moon phase, Sunrise, Sunset - App Hints screens ◆ MAKE YOUR APPLICATION UNIQUE: - THEMES - customize your app by one click or create your own ! - Fully graphical customizable (font types, backgrounds, colors, text outline …) - Fully customizable app settings (units, startup, updates, notification bar…) - ICON PACK themes PREMIUM CONTENT available (install Weather Services Iconpack add-on first) ◆ OTHER USEFUL ATTRIBUTES: - One of the best battery consumption application on the Market - Quick access to your prefered clock and calendar application (configurable) - Option to display locations time on widget - Cached weather data for offline viewing - Easy use and high-impact visual eye candy views - Broad OS compatibility: Android 1.6+, QVGA, WQVGA400/432, HVGA, WVGA800/854 And there is more to come, we develop and improve our app continuously. description: L'application Constitution du Bénin facilite et favorise l'accès au grand public des textes de la Loi Suprême du Bénin. Vous pouvez depuis votre mobile ou tablette et connecté à internet découvrir, lire, apprendre ou partager avec vos proches les articles de la Constitution. Donner l'accès au plus grand nombre de citoyens des articles de la Constitution contribue à l'éducation pour tous. Un citoyen qui connaît sa constitution connaît ses droits et devoirs envers la société. Télécharger, découvrir et comprendre les articles en famille, entre amis où que vous soyez sur votre tablette ou mobile. Vous aussi contribuer à l'éducation pour tous en partageant avec le plus grand nombre l'application. The application of the Constitution Benin facilitates and promotes public access to the texts of the Supreme Law of Benin. From your mobile or tablet you connected to the internet and discover, read, learn or share with your friends the articles of the Constitution. Provide access to the greatest number of citizens of articles of the Constitution contributes to education for all. A citizen who knows his constitution knows his rights and duties towards society. Download, discover and understand the items with family and friends wherever you are on your tablet or mobile. You also contribute to education for all by sharing the application with the greatest number.
release_text: La nouvelle version 1.1 apporte les améliorations suivantes : - L'application est disponible sans connexion internet - Nouveau bouton "Partager" en cliquant sur l'icône "i" - Correction du bug au lancement - Correction du bug lié à l'ouverture de la page "A propos" sur certains modèles de téléphone - Correction de bugs mineurs au chargement d'un article

description: Top Gear Cool Wall App Sponsored by Samsung/Phones 4U And now, it's time for the Cool Wall App... Now you can create your own Cool Walls, and rearrange the show Cool Wall itself. Using over 350 cars, you can place the cars where you think they should be on the Cool Wall and find out if the presenters think you've got it right in an audio sound bite. All the images of the cars are complete with stats. Be warned though, the car stats are highly suitable as slightly dodgy pub facts, but use sparingly when you need to win an argument. Where there was more than one model, we simply picked our favourite. For the most accurate stats, the car reviews section of www.topgear.com/uk/car-reviews is still the place to go.
release_text: Top Gear Cool Wall App Sponsored by Samsung/Phones 4U

description: From vast forests to bleak deserts, your troops roam and explore at your command, crushing enemies and establishing outposts across hostile regions that change every time you play. Crusaders is a full RTS game (a "proper" rts) where you control soldiers, archers, clerics and special heroes to defeat the opposing army. Crusaders features a game interface which blends RTS and touch screen seamlessly for a great gaming experience. Game features - * Large randomly generated maps * Randomly generated content * Four map landscapes (from forest through to jungle) * Soldier, archer, cleric, hero and monster units (each with different attributes) * Four enemy units with different attributes * Various upgrade buildings to help your conquest * Buildings can be upgraded with gold * Archer towers can be built, upgraded and repaired * Discover unique magical structures to help your conquest * Use powerful 'Hand Of God' spells to decimate the enemy * Powerful hero units can be recruited to help defeat the enemy * Soldiers and archers gain experience points for improved attributes (eventually becoming elite units) * Gold can be collected from the land or defeated enemies * Use gold to recruit new soldiers, archers and clerics * Different fierce monsters to battle * Castles and archer towers can be destroyed * Global online leaderboards (score, game time and elite units) and achievements through OpenFeint * Multiple unit animations (idle, walk, run, attack, cast, flinch and death) * Three difficulty levels * Varied and high quality SFX * Save game ability * Tutorial included * Full SD support Version 1.53 for Android versions 2.2 and above. Reading tutorial recommended. Please send any feeback or problems to - Email : crusaders.android@gmail.com Twitter : http://twitter.com/crusadersgame ** The game will NOT WORK on older generation phones - HTC Hero HTC Droid Eris HTC Magic HTC G1 HTC MyTouch 3G HTC Wildfire Samsung Sprint Moment Moto Cliq Licensing - Please make sure you have a active internet connection when first starting the game for the licensing system to work. If the game shows a license screen please power your device off and on and start the game again.

Brand new UI. Swipe left/right to change expander. Swipe up/down to change expander number. For specific use in the electronic security industry, particularly by those who use the following intruder alarm control panels:- Aritech: CD72, CD95, CD150. Interlogix: ATS, ATS Advisor, ATS Advanced, Alliance. Tecom: Challenger/Challenger V10. Innerrange: Concept. Guardall: RX16i, QX32i, PX48i, PX80i, PX500, PX250HS. Bosch: POPIT modules. release_text: 2.1 Support for App Invites. Send invitations to try app from the menu. New 'About' screen. Support added for Bosch POPIT modules. description: Paint Photo editor allows one to bring out the artist and creator in himself. With a wide variety of paint brushes, custom colors, fill buckets, tools, and editing options, this app offers far more features than any other contemporary painting, sketching, drawing or picture editing application available on store. Features: Sixteen completely different types of paint brushes to choose from (eight in free version) Fill Bucket, a completely unique tool. Image Processing tools: Twenty Image processing filters to give final touch to your prized creations (twelve in free version) Ability to choose transparent colors, setting custom colors using a user-friendly color palette Ability to load/save as .jpg and .png formats. Open any image from gallery to edit. Fill tolerance - an intelligent state-of-the-art feature that recognizes similar colored pixels and fills color between them accordingly. description: Notice !!!!- You must download adobe reader for your device. If you do not download adobe reader than you will not be able to see most of the documents. Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. Earth Science Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Earth Science. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. Earth Science Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning Earth Science, but also an app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for the Earth science regents exam and learn Earth Science. 1. This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2. Earth Science Regents interactive Fun quizzes by topic (with real regents questions) 3. Daily Earth Science and science news updates. 4. Regents exams with the key. 5. Fun videos from youtube. 6. Flash cards by topic. The topics covered are: A major understandings, skills, and real-world applications drawn from the following 8 subject areas: 1. Size, Shape, and Composition of Earth 2. Mapping 3. Rocks and Minerals 4. Weathering, Erosion, Deposition, and Landforms 5. Earthquakes and Plate Tectonics 6. Earth History 7. Meteorology and Climate 8. Astronomy This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a regents or to present a lesson. All the regents buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

description: ※本アプリはSDカード移動対応アプリです。 ゲーム内容ボリュームアップ！トリニティ・クレストの続編！本格派SFファンタジーRPG再び！ 紋章騎士「ブランク」と、それを取り巻く多くの人間の愛と運命のドラマを、ハイクオリティなビジュアルとシナリオで描き出します。 戦闘はサイドビュー方式で、攻撃モーションの一つ一つまで作り込まれています。またRPG初心者にも分かりやすい王道的スタイルをベースとしながらも、「紋章」を装備して魔法を使い分ける「クレスト・システム」や、窮地に陥ると発動する「バースト攻撃」などを盛り込み、オリジナリティと奥深さを両立させたシステムとなっています。 ◆仲間に出来るキャラも大幅増員！7名のキャラクターを操作することが出来ます！ ◆前作よりゲームボリュームもアップし、よりドラマティックな物語が描かれます！ ◆前作に引き続き、戦闘でのエフェクトもド派手に演出されています！ ◆物語を盛り上げる美麗なグラフィックイベントも多数用意！ ------------------------------------ ■ストーリー 「クレスティア管理局事件」から一年。世界は平穏な様相を見せていたが、「軍事国家ＢａBeL」による突然の周辺国侵略により、その平和は打ち破られる。 ブランクとルーナの属する「クレスティア共和国」は、「ホロゴニア王国」を挟みBaBeL と一触即発の緊張関係に陥っていた。 やがてBaBeL の圧倒的戦力により、ホロゴニアは為す術もなく滅ぼされ、さらにホロゴニアに遺跡調査隊として駐留していたルーナもまた行方不明になる。 ルーナら遺跡調査隊を見捨て、不干渉を貫く共和国の意向に逆らい、ブランクは己の地位をかなぐり捨てて恋人ルーナの捜索に向かおうとするが、彼女の行方を知るという大臣・ガルガンチュアにより、情報の提供と引き換えに「レセプター」と呼ばれる兵器の破壊の任務を負うのだった。 ルーナの行方は？ 破壊兵器「レセプター」とは？紋章騎士ブランクとその仲間達の、新たな冒険が始まるのだった。 ------------------------------------ 【対応OS】Android OS 2.1以上(2.2以上推奨) 【対応言語/language】 日本語/Japanese +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ◆よくある質問につきまして◆ ●アプリの購入およびダウンロードが出来ない アプリの購入およびダウンロードが出来ない理由としましては以下の可能性が考えられます。 1.携帯端末の設定に問題がある 2.Google Playにてエラーが発生している こちらに関する問題につきましては弊社では対応致しかねますので、お手数ですがGoogle Playへご質問お願い致します。 ●問い合わせの返事が来ない お問合せ窓口の営業は、土・日・祝日・年末年始をのぞく「月～金曜日」となります。 メールによるお問い合わせは常時受け付けておりますが、返信は営業日のみとなります。 また、お客様の携帯電話で迷惑メール設定（例：PCメール受信拒否、ドメイン指定受信、URLリンク規制等）を行っている場合は返信が不可能となってしまいますので、設定を解除いただいた上でお問い合わせください。 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ※ This app is SD card move apps. description: FDDB Extender synchronizes your food diary, favorites, diet report and much more with the online community of FDDB and offers you a lot additional features. FDDB Extender will not give you any advice to eat healthier or to loose weight. It is a powerful tool to analyze your eating habits! Features: Giant product database • Search food/products by text or barcode • Integrated Barcode-Scanner - find products fast and easy • Add products to your favorites • Detailed nutrition information (macro- and micronutrition and much more) Free Food Diary • Grouping by meals (6 separators) or time of day (3 separators) • Quickys (Shortcuts) - Save time while adding products to your diary • Add custom nutrition meals (Pro-Version only!) - Add dummy amounts of Carbohydrates, Fat and Protein to your diary • Create your own lists/recipes • Detailed day summary for calories, activities, macro- and micronutrition Plan your week! • Calorie Planner - Set calorie goals for each day of the week (Pro-Version only!) • Nutrition Planner - Set nutrition goals for each day of the week (Pro-Version only!) • Weekly Report - Detailed analysis and evaluation of Goal-Consumption-Performance (Pro-Version only!) Diet Report • Shown as diagram or as tabular view • Trend of your weight loss/gain on the Dashboard Google Fit Integration • Calories Expended (from Third-Party-Apps like Nike Running) • Weight entries (from Third-Party-Apps like FatSecret) Notice: You need a free FDDB-Account to synchronize/store your data online. If you trouble with your login information please contact the FDDB-Team via www.fddb.info.

description: Quickly and accurately calculate fuel/oil mixes easily in seconds! Application calculates the required amount of oil for proper gas oil mix ratio in a 2-stroke engine. Common two-stroke oil/fuel mixture applications include snowmobiles, motorcycles, scooters, boats, golf carts, and many other small engine applications. webmaster@sleddersworld.com Keywords: snowmobile, boat, outboard, outboard motor, motor, engine, oil, fuel, petrol, litres, gas, gasoline, mix, ratio, mix ratio, premix, pre-mix, motorcycle, scooter, marine, atv, 2 stroke, two-stroke, 2-stroke, two stroke, oil mix, oil ratio, fuel oil mix, oil calculator, chainsaw, weed eater, blower.

description: This application plots and analyzes mathematical function entered by the user. It accepts input as a mathematical expression with a variety of operators, functions and constants. The X and Y scales of the plot can be adjusted. It resolves special intrests, such as: - Extreme points (estimated) - Roots (some exact, some estimated) - Y axis intersection point (exact) - Horizontal asymptotes - Vertical asymptotes These will be marked on the graph and shown as text below it. And, should you allow it and ask it for the derivative, it can go online and download the derivative from the internet. The full available operators, functions and constants list can be found in the application itself. Supports: English, Hebrew. Note that Android devices with version 2.1 and lower can't install the current version, only an old one (which has no Hebrew) Keywords: mathematica, maths, function, plot, plotter, draw, drawer.

Gallery+ is everything that Gallery3D is, and more. It has all the existing Gallery3D functionality with the ability of creating and managing new albums on your phone without the need of an Internet connection and without duplicates of Images or Movies on the SD card. It enables you to add name and description to Images and Movies in those new albums, as well as the albums themselves. The new albums are only logical, what means that you can have a multiple copies of the image in several albums, and still maintain a single physical copy on the phone’s SD card. If you like this app, please consider donating thru PayPal. Gallery+ was developed by Evgeny E. and Kfir LA. Thanks to: - Gallery3D open source project developers and contributors for the base code for this app - Anton Post for his ideas and icon / graphic design. What is the '+' in 'Gallery+': -Ability to add an unlimited number of albums that can contain a phisical or a logical (does not take extra place on SD) copies of images or movies. -Ability of adding a name and a discription to pictures and movies in the new albums. -Auto open preselected album when the app starts. -Periodically updates which contains new app functionality reqeusted by the Gallery+ users!
release_text: After receiving many requests from our users, we are happy to announce that we've decided to renew our support in Gallery+ :) (We changed the old app's name to "OldGallery+") Recent changes: 1. Widgets are back 2. Bug fixes :)

description: Interactive Historical World Atlas since 3000 BC Have you ever tried to identify the historical facts which were simultaneously happening, in any part of the globe, during a certain period of time? If you try, you will see the enormous difficulty it conveys. In order to provide a solution to this issue and ease the study of history, we started years ago the creation of a system to represent the historical events and the geopolitical maps of any region or country in the world. The system ables you to position in any geographical area, both with a background map or relief map, zoom, navigate in time and search. Languages: English, Español, Français, Português, 简体中文, Italiano, Deutsch.

description: Android port of the open source glTRON a 3D lightbike racing game. Relive the film as you try and cut off your opponents before they cut you off!! The original and still the best Android port of GL TRON Now with user options 1) Bike Colour select from 6 colours 2) Toggle Music / SFX on/off 3) Toggle FPS counter 4) Change Camera mode 5) Select number of players between 2 and 6 6) Select Arena Size (Small, Medium, Large) 7) Select Game Speed (Slow, Normal, Fast, Extreme) Note: Increasing the Arena size and adding players reduces performance. Based on version 0.7 of glTRON found at www.gltron.org Code is under GPL and can be found here: https://github.com/Chluverman/android-gltron A wiki is also located there for help comments etc... A copy of the GPL license can be found here: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-1.0.html Please note that if you wish to re-release this code you must adhere to the GPL which means making your code change available to others.
release_text: 1.1.1 - Bug fixes 1) Back key now exits game (broken in last update) 2) Birds eye camera view fixed (was defaulting to normal) 1.1 - User preferences added 1.0 - Initial release Tested on Samsung Nexus S Samsung Galaxy S3

release_text: - Now get answers from Hoteliers and GoIbibo Travel Experts - New and improved Flights search - get the closest airport to your searched destinations. - Avail exclusive deals and discounts on Hotels on the app - Clearer and more concise details about Hotel policies - check-in, check-out, amenities offered & cancellation - Book Flight + Hotel combo and get great deals - Fly international at cheaper rates : Our best in class algorithms offer better itineraries - Bug fixes Goibibo App Download Karle, bookings Go Karde! Goibibo is the Fastest Growing & Most Trusted online travel booking platform, now available at one touch. For fast and safe bookings of Hotels, Flights & Buses, experience our app on your Android phone and book on the GO! We are sure you will find the best deals at anytime. Refer your friends to download the goibibo app, sign up using your referral code and get 1 free night stay at a hotel. Plus earn 1000 goCash. Your friend gets 2000 goCash. And there is still more. You earn another 10% (Max. 500 goCash) of your friends booking amount, when they book with us. Need a hotel booking, a flight schedule, a bus booking, we bring you great options. Choose from a wide range of best, customer reviewed hotels, extensive bus routes, and best prices on flights. description: The classic golf solitaire card game with a fun golf theme! Includes golf-related graphics and sound effects. Play 1 or all of 18 holes, each with a unique card layout. v1.7: Fixed Hole 10 bug; leaderboard names should work better now.

Hanuman Chalisa in Hindi and English with Audio on the market. This hymn was written by Goswami Tulsidas in the sixteenth century. Tulsidas wrote these forty verses in the praise of Lord Hanuman. Forty in Hindi is called 'chaalees' and the hymn containing forty verses is called 'chaaleesa'.It is extremely popular among Hindus and is generally recited on Tuesday and Saturday (considered a holy day for devotees of Lord Hanuman). Hanumanji is also known as “ Pavan Putra ”. Shri Hanuman is regarded as the God of power, strength and knowledge. He is known as the ‘param bhakt’ of lord Rama and is the incarnation of Lord Shiva. He was born to Kesari and Anjani on the Chaitra Shukla Purnima (Chaitra Shukla Purnima is the Full Moon Day on the Hindu Calendar Month of Chaitra) that is why, he is known as ‘KESERI NANDAN’ and ‘ANJANEYA’. This app has an extremely simple and user friendly interface. Salient Features: 1. English text of Shri Hanuman Chalisa 2. Hindi / Devnagari text of Shri Hanuman Chalisa 3. Will work without an Internet connection (completely offline version) 4. Soothing Melodious Audio

Challenge your brain and Test your knowledge with our Hot and Cold Game . Become the next GENIUS! One of the best games of our childhood that can be played at any age...yes, it's the Hot and Cold game! Of course you remember getting colder or hotter when searching for something and having fun with your friends. Now you have this amazing game on your Android device. The rules are pretty simple: you get 1 question and 1 image that contains more photos(collage) and you'll need to point to the right answer in order to pass the level. You get 3 different worlds to play in, 2 helping options and a lot of fun and interesting questions. Do you know the height of the Eiffel Tower? Can you find the actor from the "Die Hard" movie? Where is located the strongest muscle in the human body? You get questions from different areas like geography, filmography, anatomy, physics, automotive, animals and birds and a lot more. We guarantee you a great time playing our game. Hot and Cold game is suitable for everyone who wants to challenge their knowledge and learn something new. Accept the dare and become the next GENIUS! Now the game is available in 3 languages: English, Russian and Romanian. Stay tuned for more languages, new questions and more challenges!
release_text: Added 2 new worlds and more questions Lowered the timer for a better user experience

description: Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. HS Chemistry Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Chemistry. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching chemistry curriculum. HS Chemistry Buddy is not only an app for learning chemistry but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for chemistry exams. 1.This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2. Interactive Fun quizzes by topic 3.Daily Chemistry and science news updates. 4. Fun videos from youtube. 5. Flash cards by topic. 6. Note Taking Tools This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a High School chemistry class or to present a lesson. All the buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

Notice !!!!- You must download adobe reader for your device. If you do not download adobe reader than you will not be able to see most of the documents. Driving directions with interactive map of all anatomy and physiology Bodies exhibitions around the world. description: Marketing plan and strategy app for people who are looking to learn to promote either a product, service, or a business. This app will make you a marketing pro! You will learn to create a great marketing plan and have a great marketing strategy to help you grow your business. The app offers an ability to ask marketing questions about an existing marketing plan, or your strategy and chat with a marketing expert to help you improve your marketing plan and your overall marketing strategy. Or if you are just starting to write your marketing plan, you can get advice and various marketing strategy tips. Just ask and we will be happy to assist you! The app offers numerous tutorials on how to create a great marketing plan and marketing strategy. This apps also gives you the ability to chat with a marketing expert and get help creating your marketing plan and marketing strategy. We encourage you to ask questions and get help from marketing experts who can coach you. All questions are answered by an entrepreneur experienced in both offline marketing and online marketing. Your marketing plan and strategy questions can range across topics such as SEO, SEM, local service advertising, email marketing, PR and more. Answers to theoretical questions are available as well. - All live marketing plan questions are answered by an experienced entrepreneur within 48 hours but often in under one hour in over 80% of cases. - The app also offers a number of small business marketing articles and tutorials on topics of SEO, SEM, social media marketing, and other techniques. We will continue to add articles to the app every month. The current set of articles covers topics such as: 1) Small business marketing fundamentals 2) Internet startup marketing 3) Small business marketing strategy for a local service with SEO, SEM and local business search 4) How to quickly set up a professional website for your business, and tips for marketing your business on the web with your website. 5) Internet marketing tips and strategy Visit the Problemio website at http://www.problemio.com for more apps and information.

Share secret messages with photos right on Twitter, Facebook, or anywhere you want. Create a secret message, select your friends who should see it, and then create a public version for everyone else. Only those who have access can unlock the secret; the others will see whatever you want. Go Masq your message and share it with the world! Other ways to use Masq: Share two different photos from last night’s party right on Twitter – only a few will see the “secret” one and everyone else will see the other version. Post an invitation to just 10 of your friends on Twitter, but the rest of the world will see a more generic message. Masq currently works with other Android friends only. Your feedback is appreciated so we can add more of what you want! Please email comments to feedback@masqapp.com .

Mathex Scientific Calculator Fully featured, expression based, scientific calculator which looks and operates like a real one. Mathex includes the following features: * Direct algebraic logic: enter equations as they are written * History Playback: Recall any of the 10 last steps you have made * Expression (re)editing: change equations and recalculate * Chain calculations: use answer in following equation * 2-Line display: check your equation and answer at the same time * Intuitive Plotting feature * Symbolic derivative * Metric conversions * Physical constants table * 10 numerical memories * Percentages calculations * Combinatorial operators * Trigonometry functions in degrees, radians or grads * Normal, Fixed, Scientific or Engineering display modes * Thin space digit grouping (SI/ISO 31-0 standard) * Random number generator/White Noise for functions * Sturdy, stylish look To request support visit: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dDhzQkFuUWlLT0Y2TXkxVDV4d3QtM3c6MQ

developer: NSW Department of Education and Communities
description: Are you in search of an educational game to sharpen your child’s maths skills and recall? You’ll find the answer with the Maths Monkey’s Quest - an entertaining game produced by the NSW Department of Education and Communities. Features Maths Monkey’s Quest features maths questions on topics ranging from addition and subtraction to ratios and percentages. It is aimed at children from Years 3 to 8. Answer questions by shooting the correct answer to keep the bananas safe. Add bananas to unlock new levels that feature more difficult questions. The goal is to earn the highest score while you keep the worm away from your bananas! Our app features a non-competitive practice track for your child to practise their maths recall without the need to protect the monkey’s bananas. From there your child can enter the ‘Jungle’ level (aimed at Years 3 and 4 students) and work to unlock the other game levels: · Beach (Years 5 to 6) · City (Years 7 and 8) · Outback (Years 7 and 8 – more advanced). Keep track of your score on the High Scores leader board and have multiple player profiles. The Maths Monkey’s Quest is presented by School A to Z www.schoolatoz.com.au, which provides practical help for parents of school-aged children.

Fazer o controle financeiro ficou mais fácil. O gerenciador financeiro do Minhas Economias permite que você organize suas contas, faça o seu controle de gastos e de receitas, crie orçamentos e planeje melhor a sua vida financeira. Com um controle financeiro, fica mais fácil saber aonde você está gastando, pagar as contas em dia, fazer sobrar dinheiro no final do mês e realizar os seus sonhos. Com o gerenciador financeiro do Minhas Economias é possível gerenciar as contas de diversos bancos, cartões de crédito, investimentos, financiamentos, aposentadoria, tudo em um só lugar. Uma planilha de gastos completa, com sincronização nas nuvens. O Minhas Economias é seguro, anônimo e gratuito. CONTROLE FINANCEIRO DE QUALQUER LUGAR! O Minhas Economias (www.minhaseconomias.com.br) é um gerenciador financeiro completo, simples e fácil de usar. Possui ferramentas de controle financeiro, orçamento, gerenciador de sonhos, gráficos e relatórios que ajudam a tomar decisões mais acertadas e a planejar a suas finanças pessoais com mais qualidade de vida. Ao criar uma conta no Minhas Economias, todos os gastos e receitas cadastrados no aplicativo de controle financeiro Android podem ser sincronizados com o sistema de controle financeiro na nuvem. Desta forma, seus dados estão mais seguros, e mesmo que você troque ou perca o seu celular ou tablet, é possível acessar o seu controle financeiro. Com esta versão do aplicativo de controle financeiro para Android, você poderá: - Verificar o saldo de todas as suas contas - Analisar gráficos - Cadastrar transações de despesas, receitas e transferências - Programar repetição de transações - Lançar parcelamentos de gastos e receitas - Cadastrar lembretes para não atrasar contas - Cadastrar notas - Categorizar gastos e receitas - Consultar e alterar os gastos e receitas já cadastrados - Acompanhar notícias de finanças pessoais - Sincronizar com o sistema de controle financeiro na nuvem SEGURANÇA - O cadastro é anônimo - Não há operações financeiras efetivas - O seu app é protegido com um código de segurança de 4 dígitos - Sincronização com conexão criptografada. SINCRONIZAÇÃO COM O MINHASECONOMIAS.COM.BR Todas as operações efetuadas no aplicativo podem ser sincronizadas com o MinhasEconomias.com.br. Assim, mesmo que você não esteja conectado, é possível fazer lançamentos para depois sincronizar as suas informações. Da mesma forma, você pode fazer atualizações no MinhasEconomias.com.br e depois sincronizá-las com o seu aplicativo. PLANEJAMENTO FINANCEIRO A maioria dos gerenciadores financeiros (ou planilhas de gastos) permite apenas que se controle as despesas e receitas passadas. Já com o Minhas Economias, você pode também lançar transações recorrentes pelo tempo que quiser e acompanhar a evolução futura de suas contas bancárias, cartões de crédito etc, e ter o devido planejamento financeiro para realizar seus sonhos. PLANILHA DE GASTOS Além disto, a planilha de gastos do Minhas Economias permite que se faça um planejamento financeiro de modo a prever os saldos futuros de suas contas bancárias e, assim, ajudar os usuários a não entrar no cheque especial OUTRAS FERRAMENTAS Sincronize seus dados e acesse a sua conta no MinhasEconomias.com.br para criar novas contas, criar novas categorias, fazer orçamentos, criar sonhos, analisar gráficos e relatórios. Acesse também nosso blog e confira dicas de como administrar melhor o seu dinheiro. Making financial control easier. The financial manager My Savings lets you organize your bills, make your control spending and revenue, create budgets and better plan your financial life. With a financial control, it becomes easier to know where you're spending, pay bills on time, make money leftover at the end of the month and realize their dreams. With the financial manager My savings is possible to manage the accounts of various banks, credit cards, investments, loans, retirement, all in one place. A complete spreadsheet of expenses, with synchronization in the clouds. The My savings is safe, anonymous and free. FINANCIAL CONTROL ANYWHERE! The My Economies (www.minhaseconomias.com.br) is a complete, simple and easy to use financial manager. Has financial control tools, budget, dreams manager, graphs and reports that help you make better decisions and to plan their personal finances better quality of life. By creating an account at My Economies all expenditures and financial control of the registered Android app revenue can be synchronized with the system of financial control in the cloud. This way, your data is safer, and even if you change or lose your phone or tablet, you can access your financial control. With this version of the financial control app for Android, you can: - Check the balance of all your accounts - Analyze graphs - Post transaction expenses, income and transfers - Schedule repeating transactions - Launch installment expenditures and revenues - Post reminders not to delay bills - Post notes - Categorize expenses and revenues - Consult and change spending and revenue already registered - Monitor personal finance news - Synchronize with the system of financial control in the cloud SAFETY - The registry is anonymous - No effective financial operations - Your app is protected by a 4-digit security - Synchronization with encrypted connection. SYNC WITH MINHASECONOMIAS.COM.BR All operations performed in the application can be synchronized with the MinhasEconomias.com.br. So even if you are not connected, it is possible to make postings to then sync your information. Likewise, you can make updates in MinhasEconomias.com.br and then synchronize them with your application. FINANCIAL PLANNING Most financial managers (or spreadsheets spending) only permits the expenditure and revenue is passed control. Already with the My Savings, you can also launch recurring transactions as long you like and follow the future evolution of their bank accounts, credit cards etc, and have proper financial planning to achieve your dreams. EXPENSES WORKSHEET In addition, the expenditures of My Savings allows you to do financial planning in order to predict future balances of your bank accounts and thus help users to not enter the overdraft OTHER TOOLS Synchronize your data and access your account on MinhasEconomias.com.br to create new accounts, create new categories, making budgets, create dreams, analyze charts and reports. Also visit our blog and check out tips on how to better manage your money.

description: Welcome to MovieScanner - the ultimate Android Movie and Game inventory app! Have you been collecting DVD's, Blu-rays, PS3/Xbox/Wii games and video tapes and always wanted to have a current catalog of what you own? Until now, this was a cumbersome job involving a PC, some kind of database program and LOTS of time... but not anymore! MovieScanner lets you build a compehensive list of your movies in an automated and convenient way - without typing! And you can take it on the road, too! You simply scan the bar codes on the back of your DVD, Blu-Ray or even your old VHS cases. On devices without camera, simply type in the codes and get the same amazing result! Movie data is automatically pulled from the internet using our own web service that is constantly being updated to guarantee the best possible hit rate. As data gets stored on your iPhone for offline reference, each movie shows up in the list with it's title, genre and a cover image. A powerful search option lets you find any movie in just seconds. In details view, you can see a short description of the movie, the genre, and in many cases a direct link to the movie trailer! What's more, you can simply add a personal note and choose from 4 user-defined flags that let you mark any movie as especially cool, given to someone, on your wishlist etc. With the new bluetooth multi-user option, you can even share your movie list with other MovieScanner users - or eMail the list as a CSV or XML file. ATTRIBUTION: MovieScanenr uses two separate algorithms for recognizing barcodes. One is part of the ZXing Project: http://bit.ly/zxproj which is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License. Full: http://bit.ly/a2license

description: This app will help you to catch more fish. Log all your catches smart and simple, get social, check the latest catch reports, know what bait to use and challenge your friends for a real MyCatch Battle! - Quick, smart and simple logging - All catches are synced online - Get social with anglers around the world - Fish finder with the latest catch reports - Challenge friends to a real fishing battle - Analyse personal statistics and maps - Flexible sharing settings -Log smart and simple MyCatch stands for quick and easy, yet accurate and detailed logging. That means more fishing and less fumbling with your phone. And while your phone may not be waterproof, MyCatch is! All your data are immediately synchronized with Mycatchapp.com/yourname, pretty smart, isn’t it? So don’t worry next time your phone goes for an unscheduled dive because your catch reports won’t sink along with it. - Get social Add friends and keep them updated on your fishing adventures, even while you’re still out on the water! Effortlessly post simultaneously on Facebook and your personal MyCatch Wall. Being a limitless global social network, you can also chat with fellow fishermen around the world, view their catches and use their fishing experience to your advantage. - Battle your friends So you think you can fish? Prove it with MyCatch Battle! Have fun with friends near and far and challenge them to a fishing contest. All fish caught, logged and supported with a picture during the battle are marked on the MyCatch Leaderboard. This winner is rewarded with a genuine MyCatch Medal of Honor. So get ready, set and... Battle! - Fish finder Finding fish has never been so easy. Search the area and period of your choice, filter specific species and find the most reliable and up-to-date catch reports in the world. Every catch that is shared on MyCatch will be shown with highly valuable information, such as: weather, date, water and fishing depth, bait and fishing tackle. The statistics utility at Mycatchapp.com helps you analize your trackrecord, supported by amazing maps and very interesting graphs. Use them to enhance your skills and become an even better angler. Let it be clear that MyCatch is simply the most valuable fish finder there is! - Flexible sharing settings Your privacy is our priority. Therefore we offer flexible sharing settings. You are fully in control of all you fishing data, so you’re not obliged to share anything whatsoever. Wether you want to share just some of your catches with everyone, all of them with only your friends, nothing at all, or anything in between... all is possible!

description: Remote control for your Netgear NeoTV 550 media player via wifi

Love music? Love going out? You need Secret DJ. Features Find - the best bars, pubs & music nearby. See - whats tunes are playing in your local right now . Be the DJ - pick songs in venues with a Secret DJ jukebox. Share - the music, places and people you like via Facebook and Twitter. About Secret DJ Secret DJ lets you keep in touch with what's playing and what's happening in all of your favourite bars and pubs... Location savvy - it'll let you know where's cool and worth visiting nearby. With Secret DJ you can check in to all the best places and let your friends know where to meet up so you never miss a great night out. Feel the vibe - in venues that are part of the Secret DJ network you'll be a able to see what's playing - right now. Always social - Secret DJ lets you share all the songs, people and places you like via Twitter and Facebook. You can also link directly to the venue's own website. Someone special caught your eye? Let them know you're interested via Secret DJ. Be the music - in bars that use a Secret DJ jukebox, you can select songs to play straight from your Android phone. Select enough tunes and you'll become the official Secret DJ of the bar - then you can impress your friends when your tracks always come on first. Download today - and remember everybody wants to be a Secret DJ... Application Permissions ----------------------- When you install Secret DJ we ask for certain permissions on your phone. The reason we ask for each persmission is listed below. Your location: We need to know where you are to show you places nearby. Network communication: We need the internet to send you information and images. Your accounts: We need to create an account when you login. Storage: We need to store viewed images so you don't have download them again. Phone calls: We need to stop the audio preview playing when you receive a phone call.
release_text: We heard you! Secret DJ now comes with search for artists and songs

description: Stream Sensor Data From Your Phone To A PC Or A Classroom Of PC’s Before you download this app! SensorScope requires a program downloaded to a Windows PC. This program “SensorScope.exe” is free and available for download on our website at www.pinkleopardsoftware.com. While there, check out our other exciting professional products available through the Play Store. SensorScope allows you to view output from your Android devices’ sensors on a PC over Wi-Fi. It gives you a real-time view of the internal workings of your phone. A developers dream come true. SensorScope streams data on your Wi-Fi network to every computer connected to your access point. The information streamed by SensorScope will not route. As an example, If you’re at Starbucks and start SensorScope, the data will be available to every PC in the coffee shop (I’m sure they would find it utterly fascinating!) but people in a Starbucks across the street will not be able to receive it. The program on the PC is free making it ideal for teaching Android Programming or Physics. SensorScope was developed as a programming tool for our in-house staff and is now being released to the general public. There is no setup involved. Start the Windows and Android program and SensorScope takes care of all the details. It's a perfect tool for the classroom.

Start the new adventures of 2015-2016 Serie A and Serie B football championships! With PUSH Notifications will receive updates of goals and scorers of your favorite teams, all FREE and without the need to keep the application active and avoiding the abnormal consumption of battery and data connection. You can have all the match schedule at your fingertips on your Android device, always available without connecting to the internet (also works in the elevator!) The program always displays the next match day, while you can scroll left and right with your finger to display the entire league schedule. Full support for results, advances and deferred, for both Serie A and Serie B, and the data are automatically updated via Internet! You can also display the matches, standings and top scorers of championships starting from the 2009/2010 and head-to-head between two teams during the season. For any advice or problem use the form inside the app, or write an e-mail to android@araneum.it IMPORTANT : the service of push notifications DOES NOT WORK THROUGH SMS and has NO ADDITIONAL COST .

description: Shri Shiv Chalisa is a devotional song based on Lord Shiva. Happy Maha Shivratri!! Adapted from the Shiva Purana, it consists of 40 chaupais and recited daily or on special festivals like Maha Shivaratri by Shivaites, and worshipers of Shiva.Lord. Shiv is one of the Gods of the trinity of Gods which Hindus believe in, the other two being Brahma and Vishnu. This app has an extremely simple and user friendly interface. Upon loading, you are immediately taken to the actual Chalisa Text; no more clicking and navigating through meaningless screens. Salient Feature: 1. Hindi version of Shri Shiv Chalisa 2. Soothing Audio 3. Works without an Internet connection

Shopping List is the most easy way to organise your shopping lists. It is minimalistic, intuitive and easy to use, it keeps your grocery shopping list without bothering you with complex features. The development of Shopping List is supported by advertisement - it costs you less than a coffee to remove it :) Features include: • Multiple shopping lists • Add products to the shopping lists • Share lists by text, email, WhatsApp etc. • Mark items in your shopping list as "bought" or "in shopping cart" • Drag and drop products to reorder them as you like • Edit items on the list (long-press on an item and click the edit icon) • Save time by using suggestions as you start typing a product name • Suggestions are personalised • Manage the list of suggestions (directly when they appear) As you start typing a product, Shopping List shows up suggestions that you can add very fast to the your shopping list. It comes with a bunch of popular suggestions for you to start with. All products you enter in your shopping cart will later be available as suggestions so that you will save time when preparing your shopping list. Add multiple shopping lists to keep products you will buy in different stores separated. Requested permissions: This app requires access to internet since it is a requirement for the ads in the app. *** Suggest new features at http://www.kiwi3.com/vote By among the first ones to try out new features and help us improve, join the Shopping List Beta Test community on Google+ at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/116568593397465748278 More languages? Help with translations at http://crowdin.net/project/shoppinglist
release_text: New in this version: • added optional settings, among others for: • decide whether to insert products at beginning or end of the list • show number of products in each list • bug fixes Please help us and report any errors at shopping.list.feedback@gmail.com, thanks :)

description: "It can't be simpler". For the one who wants to better control their budget. A Simple Budget Tool based on Envelope budgeting, that may help you to control your spending just by doing simple steps: 1. Create your envelopes 2. Set the budget for each envelope 3. Record your spending 4. Voila! you can see how much money that left for spending and decide your next step Hopefully it can help you to improve your financial condition Features: 1. Automatically reset the envelope every month. 2. View monthly transaction history per envelope. 3. Data stored locally, internet connection is not required. 4. Set next month budget. 5. Refund transaction. 6. Set different color for each envelopes. 7. Quick add transaction 8. Transfer between envelopes. 9. Consolidated transaction list. 10. Support backup to Dropbox. Change Total Budget To change the total budget, you need to change each individual envelope, there are two ways to edit the envelope: 1. Long press on designated envelope, tap "edit" option. 2. Go to envelope detail screen, and tap "edit" icon on the top right screen. There are two ways to change Currency: 1. Tap Menu > Settings > Select Currency. 2. By changing the Language setting. On the Android home screen, tap menu button: Menu > Settings > Language and Input > Language > [Choose the language] Quick Add Transaction: - enter the transaction amount - press '+' button Add Transaction with Details: - don't enter transaction amount - press '+' button Ads supported. It does support more than 6 envelopes. CLEAN app.
release_text: v2.9.5: - fix missing digit when deposit amount v2.9.4: - bug fix on deposit amount v2.9.3: - bug fixes v2.9.2: - Support Dropbox for backup v2.9.1: - fix crash for older devices v2.8.0: - New layout v.2.7.0: - Add notes v2.6.0: - Add rollover. Disabled by default. To enabled please go to Menu > Settings > Enable rollover v2.5.3: - Improve performance v2.5.2: - Fix currency issue To those who are wondering, simplebudget does support more than 6 envelopes.

description: Simple Spending Tracker makes it easy to record and track your spending habits over time. Enter your expenses as you go about your day, or set up recurring expenses that will be automatically created at defined intervals. A variety of graphing options make it easy to see which spending categories take the biggest bite out of your finances.

The application also has built-in night light. The interface is available in 30 languages. Settings (English): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5yvKjToFMTk This application is based on a real medications (which costs about $ 100). A medical device (ie, a prototype) sends a beam of light on the ceiling. Light becomes a brighter, then dimmer. With this pulsation user must synchronize his breath. Pulsation occurs every 5 seconds. Thus, breathing becomes deep (using yoga). With such a breath in your body stops production of cortisol (a stress hormone), and you will quickly fall asleep. When the glow is bright, it is necessary to inhale when the glow fades to do exhale. The person who tested the program, said this: This afternoon has tested a new application that helps you fall asleep quickly. Launched - and immediately fell asleep. Woke up at 14 o'clock. Thought maybe I accidentally fell asleep. Turned on again. And went back to sleep. Woke up at 17 o'clock. "Well, how about now, I wonder." Asleep to 20.00. Good app. Works. *** There are two versions of the application: 1. Lite. - Contains ads. - Sleep timer is only 15 minutes. - Just a white glow. - No sound of inhalation and exhalation. 2. Complete. - Does not contain advertising. - Timer: 10 - 60 minutes. - Select the screen color: white, red, blue, green, yellow. And also - change (overflow) colors. - Can be accompanied by a low sound of inhalation and exhalation. *** We decided that the phone has all of these features. Why do you need to buy unnecessary and expensive device? Functional (as compared to the prototype) has increased considerably. You can choose different colors of light, choose a specific time for automatic shutdown (full version only). Despite the fact that the pulsation is visible when the eyes are closed (in the room should be dark), however, we also added the sound of breathing that accompanies the pulse. The default pulse frequency is 5 seconds. This is the average for adults. But for the children, you can configure a more frequent pulse. Children breathe more often. When the glow is bright, it is necessary to inhale when the glow fades to exhale. If you breathe more or less frequently, you can set a different frequency. The application has a lot of options for different types of breathing. In the application, in addition, we have integrated nightlight. This is primarily for children who are afraid to sleep in the dark. Night light shines for a while, and then turned off (as configured). In the full version, you can choose the color of light, as well as the smooth transition of colors. It is beautiful. The glow is perfectly visible through the eyelids (in room should be dark). If you do not see the glow, then point the phone's screen on your face. You can also activate the soft sound of breathing, which will accompany the pulsation (full version only). First, the user, following the sound of inhalation and exhalation ceases to think of something. Second, the sound is mesmerizing, like a metronome. If the brightness of the screen annoys you, you can choose a low brightness screen phone (via System Preferences). Then the glow will be minimal, and the user will hear only the sound of breathing. *** Recommended for good sleep also use our another application "Management dreams", which contains audio scripts for relaxation. And also - you can program the interior and atmosphere of your dreams. http://globalappsr.blogspot.ru/2012/11/new-project-application-dream-manager.html
release_text: 3 / 1.2 - new design. - lulling sound of breath: now in lite-version. - brightness and sound control in both versions. - widget for lite version.

description: Сны видят все, хотя не все их помнят. Часто сны забываются сразу после пробуждения, а иногда бывают настолько яркими, что запоминаются на несколько месяцев, а то и лет. Запоминаются сновидения или нет, они каждую ночь нашей жизни сортируют и снимают напряжение, накопившееся за день. Однако сны часто несут важную информацию, которую наша бессознательное стремится донести до нашего сознания... Такие значимые сны часто бывают эмоционально насыщенными или повторяющимися. Надеюсь это приложение сможет помочь постичь ту информацию которую несут Ваши сновидения. * * * * На текущий момент в состав сонника входят: 1) Сонник Ванги. 2) Сонник Миллера. 3) Сонник Нострадамуса. 4) Сонник мисс Хассэ. 5) Сонник Фрейда. 6) Сонник Лоффа. 7) Ассирийский сонник. 8) Сонник Эзопа. 9) Интимный сонник Даниловой. 10) Сонник Дашку. 11) Народный сонник. 12) Интимный сонник Власовой. 13) Сонник Цветкова. 14) Семейный сонник. 15) Цыганский сонник. 16) Кулинарный сонник. 17) Мусульманский сонник. 18) Сонник друидов. 19) Сонник Азара. 20) Любовный сонник. 21) Английский сонник. 22) Календарный сонник. Dreams can see everything, although not all of them remember. Most dreams are forgotten immediately after waking up, and sometimes so vivid that are stored for a few months, or even years. Remembered dream or not, they are every night of our lives sorted and relieve stress accumulated during the day. However, dreams often carry important information that our unconscious seeks to convey to our consciousness ... Such dreams are often important emotionally saturated or repetitive. I hope this app can help to comprehend the information carried by your dreams. * * * * At the moment of the dream book includes: 1) Dream Interpretation Vanga. 2) Dream Miller. 3) Dream Book of Nostradamus. 4) Dreams Miss Hasse. 5) Dreams Freud. 6) Dreams Lofa. 7) The Assyrian dream book. 8) Dream Book of Aesop. 9) Intimate sonnik Danilova. 10) Dreams Dasha. 11) People dream book. 12) Intimate sonnik Vlasova. 13) Dreams Tsvetkov. 14) Family dream book. 15) Gypsy dream book. 16) Culinary dream book. 17) The Islamic dream interpretation. 18) Dream Book of the Druids. 19) Dreams Azar. 20) Love dream book. 21) English dream book. 22) calendar dream book.

description: Thank you all for the downloads! You have made this to be the most popular implementation of SoS Game in play store! The favourite classic game that we all have played usually at class-room with pencil and paper, is available on Android! You can play with your friends or versus the computer. There are two difficulty levels normal and hard and the SoS Game uses random engine so the computer won't make the same moves all the time. The hard difficulty level is very challenging and anticipates the future moves. For those who don't know how to play sos Game here are the rules. 1)Sos is a two player game played in a 2D grid e.g. 7x7. 2)The players have the option to put either S or O at an empty square. 3)Each turn plays one player. 4)If a player makes an SOS sequence (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) that player plays another turn. 5)The player which will make the most SOS sequences wins. ENJOY!!!
release_text: Version 2.5 Fixed a bug which causes crashes on tablets. Version 2.4 Added Turkish language. Version 2.3 Slightly reduced application size. Version 2.0 Added the ability to move the game to sd card.

description: OVER 600,000 DOWNLOADS! JOIN THE FUN! YOUR KIDS ARE GOING TO LOVE IT! Trumpets, Harmonicas, Trains, Boats, Horses, Sheep, Cats, whatever sounds inspire your child, Sound Touch has it! This delightful learning app allows children to choose from an extensive list of sounds lovingly presented in cartoon images for easy recognition. If they like birds, just tap the whimsical icon of the bird and a hi-resolution photograph will appear accompanied by a crystal clear recording of their sound choice. ** POPULAR FEATURE ** Available in 35 languages worldwide, each sound has five different versions to listen to. So, if your child selects the dog, listens to the sound of a dog, and then taps it again, a different dog sound plays accompanied by a different dog image to enjoy. Children find it absolutely irresistible! === Sound Touch FEATURES === • Fun and engaging learning. • Intuitive interface. • Simple controls. • Brilliant photographs and graphics. • Top quality sound recordings. • A huge selection! • Optimization for all the latest mobile devices. • Updates to ensure flawless use and new bonus features. • Available in 35 languages! With Almost 400 Amazing Pictures & Sounds of Animals, Vehicles and Musical Instruments, Sound Touch is The Original Fun Sound Learning App Since 2009! *** GREAT APP FOR KIDS *** “The app is wonderful for preschool kids to learn the farm animals, wild animals, vehicles and others. The app is well designed with HD pictures and real sound effects. Highly recommended.” -- Albert Finch Every parent wants his or her children to enjoy learning. Sound Touch delivers the kind of fun, engaging, learning that parents have been looking for, and that kids can’t put down. It’s right at their fingertips wherever you are and it’s FREE! Don’t just settle for a mindless video game or cartoon, let your kids learn while they’re having fun with Sound Touch! === HOW Sound Touch WORKS === • Choose from the category silhouettes across the bottom. • Tap one of the twelve cartoon icons. • See the brilliant photograph with the clear sound. • Tap the same icon to hear a different sound from that same selection. • Choose a different category silhouette for a new grid of choices. *** GREAT APP! *** “Nice app to entertain your kids :) touch the icon of the animal and you will hear the sound :) really funny and educative for your children.” -- berluscano Feel free to drop us a line! We’re always listening to your suggestions to improve Sound Touch! If you have any issues with the app, just contact us and we will help you! ** Are you loving Sound Touch? We’d love to hear about it! Please take a moment to leave us a nice review. It really helps! ** While you’re in the sharing mood, go ahead and throw us a like on Facebook too, THANKS! We appreciate your support greatly! You inspire us to make more great apps like Sound Touch! ********************** Check out also: · Sound Touch 2 · Video Touch - Animals · Video Touch - Wildlife · Video Touch - Birds · Video Touch - Bugs & Insects · Video Touch - Vehicles · Video Touch - Musical Instruments
release_text: - Another item (6th) was added to every animal to the "wildlife" and "birds" categories. - Added Australian English and Czech languages. - Some pictures and sounds were replaced. - Bug fixes.

Use it as a handy reference tool or as a fun way to learn new words in Spanish. Best of all, it’s free! ★ "The Best Spanish App" ____________________________ FEATURES ★ Spanish English Dictionary - Full Spanish-English dictionary with examples, regional usage, and contextual information. - Much faster than apps that require an Internet connection to lookup words. - Words are autosuggested as you type. ★Favorites - Keep track of words you are learning with the Favorites feature. - E-mail yourself your Favorites list at any time with one click. We hope you enjoy the app. Be sure to leave a positive feedback rating and tell your friends if you like it. And as always, good luck with your Spanish! ★ ¡Hasta luego! SpanishDict Team

description: As the world’s largest hotel search, trivago compares over 900,000 deals from more than 250 booking sites daily on our mission to be and remain the travellers’ first and independent source for finding the ideal hotel at the lowest rates. No matter where in the world you are looking, trivago is your partner in locating an optimal home away from home, no matter your budget, even at the very last minute. Get it now, get it on the go – download our app for free today. Top Price: - Cheapest deals filtered out every time - Our database is constantly updating itself – great last-minute deals and discounts found in the search results - We compare several prices for the same room to find you the cheapest one to fit your budget and get you the best value for your money Top Filtering Options: - Our online comparison finds exactly what you’re looking for, no matter when you travel, where you travel, what your itinerary is or how your budget stands - Filter by price - set the maximum price you want to pay and we will locate the best hotel for this value - Search by location – compare accommodation in whatever part of the world you need to book, and we will show you the best choices in our extensive comparison - Filter by POI and attractions - find the best location in proximity to what you want to see. Perfect for setting your travel itinerary - Filter accommodation immediately for Wifi, pool, beach, spa and design Top Clarity: - The trivago Rating Index (tRI) is a fair and accurate rating score which is actually an aggregation of all available rating scores on the web - An integrated map function takes you directly to the door, no matter where you are travelling from Top Interface: - The sleek, simple design makes booking on the go a fun and easy experience Top Brand: - Voted as one of The Guardian’s “10 best money-saving apps” - Ranked on Independent.ie as one of the “best money-saving apps” Hotel? trivago!

!THIS EARLY STAGE VERSION IS NOT PLAYABLE YET! This is a continuous development version of a new game with the work title 'Dvergar Fortress'. Dvergar is a Norse word for Dwarves. The game simulates a vertical 2D world underground. The dvergar people mines for metals, works for more wealth and fights against enemies. Best playable with an tablet and Android up from version 4.0 The game vision is inspired primarily by 'Dwarf Fortress" and "Dungeon keeper". I love "Dwarf fortress" but it has many drawbacks: not playable on tablets, too many micro management, too complex user interface. I will keep the most fun aspects: mining, fighting, crafting and social simulation elements and remove the boring micro management stuff like making soap and fertilising the farms. User feedback is highly appreciated. Please install the app, so I will know how high is demand for such game and that the development is not completely a waste of my spare time.

What is Canyon Bunny? Canyon Bunny is a classic side-scrolling Jump’n’Run game for your mobile device but more in the sense of a Tech Demo to show off the cross-platform game development capabilities of the open source Libgdx framework. Canyon Bunny was designed by Gamerald and serves as a practical example to help understanding how to use Libgdx. The game’s technical details are thoroughly discussed in the book “Learning Libgdx Game Development” (Packt Publishing). For our curious visitors, we have put up a free Android app of Canyon Bunny on the Google Play Store so that you can check it out right now if you like. To find out more about the book, check out the following link: http://gamerald.com/learning-libgdx/

description: *** NEW 2013-08-13 *** In the next few hours will release an update that fixes the login into game --- Play free online. Live Spades. Bids, blinds and bags. Online play alone or with a friend. Spades is a partnership trick-taking card game devised in the United States in the 1930s, in which the object is for each pair or partnership to take at least the number of tricks they bid on before Spades play is began. Spades is a descendant of the Whist family of card games, which also includes Bridge, Hearts, and Oh, Hell. Spades major difference as compared to other whist variants is that, instead of trump being decided by the highest bidder or at random, the spade suit is always trump, hence the name - Spades. online spades, free spades, play spades, cards spades, multiplayer spades. Available features: - Login with facebook or android account. - Profile with picture and full stats. - Ranking with balanced points. - General rank. - Weekly Rank. - Daily rank. - Private messages. - Global chat, game chat. - History of your played games. - Create private or public table. - Tournaments with 5 rounds - Trial 30 days Similar games: Hearts. online hearts, free hearts, play hearts, cards hearts, multiplayer hearts.

app_name: 大老二 神來也心機大老2(Big2)
description: New Big2 for Android - Everyone’s Favorite Big Two, now with a Twist! ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play free: Get as much as 1200 chips to start out with ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players Announcing New Big2, a Big Two poker game with entirely new possibilities! New Big2 (also called Deuces) combines the traditional Big Two with a new card matching function, resulting in a fresh new gameplay. Card matching means you can now add your cards to the combination played out on the table – for example, turn a single into a pair, or a pair into a full house. Make clever use of card combinations to create your best hand! = Features = ♥ Classic Taiwanese Big Two, also known as Deuces, with card matching feature ♥ Display available beat and match options. Don't miss a single chance ♥ Over 23 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ Loads of gifts, daily bonuses ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Easy-to-use controls you can use with just one finger ♥ Use Interactives (emoticons) to talk to friends ♥ Verified members gain 888 daily chips! = Newest Android Version = ♣ Updated table design ♣ New cool titles wait for you to be earned! = Gameplay = ♦ Basic rules: The player with the 3 of clubs begins by playing this card or any valid combination containing it. Then players go clockwise playing their combinations on top of the current one. If they don't have a valid combination they must pass. If all three other players pass you can either play another combination on top of the current one or start a new one. Whoever loses their hand first wins! ♦ Valid combinations are: (single, pair, Straight, Full House) < Four of a Kind < Straight Flush < Dragon. The last three combinations (Four of a Kind, Straight Flush, Dragon) are called Monsters because they can override smaller combinations of any type, whereas non-Monster combinations can only override smaller combinations of the same type. ♦ Once you choose to pass you can't play the current combination anymore and have to wait until a new one is started (this complies with the official Big Two regulations). ♦ Card Matching feature: 　． Beat or match! Example: You hold a 7 of spades and the previous player plays a 7 of hearts. You can choose whether to beat his 7 or create a pair. 　．No hand is lost! Example: You hold A,3,4,5 and the previous player plays a 2 - instant Straight! 　．Open possibilities! You hold 6,6,7,7 and the previous player plays a pair of 6's, you can do a Full House (6,6,6,7,7) or Four of a Kind (6,6,6,6,7)! 　．Save up your triples! Wait for the right opportunity and turn the game around with a sudden Full House! = Additional Notes = ♦ Users can use their existing GodGame, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other accounts to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/bigtwoapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa- Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? app_name: 德州撲克 神來也皇家德州撲克(Texas Poker)
description: = Play Texas poker, secret agent style! Over 23 million players worldwide! The top authentic Royal Hold'em poker! = ○ Play free: get as much as 30,000 chips to start out with ○ Higher hands are more fun! Royal Hold’em Uses 10’s through Aces only for better winning chances ○ Feel the casino flair with hot dealers and real voices = Royal Hold’em Features = ○ Authentic Royal Hold'em ○ Over 20 million players - tap twice and you're in ○ Employ your best strategy to win ○ Join the Blackjack table and spin the Slots in the new Vegas Casino ○ Intuitive UI, easy one-button functions ○ Use Interactives (emoticons) to talk to friends ○ Loads of gifts, daily bonuses ○ New reconnect function - bet with confidence =Newest Android Version= ○ Choose your favorite dealer to bring you luck ○ Improved Blackjack for greater chances = Rules = ○ Blinds: Two forced bets called small blind and big blind will be placed by two respective players. These mark the minimum bet during the game. ○ Preflop: After blinds have been placed, two cards are dealt to each player (in Royal Hold'em only 10's through Aces are used.) and the first round starts. Each player decides whether to continue or fold (i.e. stop playing and give up the chance to win). ○ Flop: After the first round has ended, the dealer places three cards face up on the table. These are called community cards. Then the second round begins and players can raise, call, or fold, depending on their confidence in the combination of their hands together with the community cards. If they raise, all players who want to stay in the game have to increase the ante to the amount set by the raising player. ○ Turn: After the second round, the dealer places a fourth community card on the table. The third round starts and all remaining players decide whether to raise, call, or fold as previously. ○ River: After the third round has ended, the dealer places the fifth and last community card on the table. Players raise, call, or fold, depending on their confidence in their hand. ○ Final round: If the remaining players after the fourth round of betting are two or more, all players show their hands and compare cards. The player with the highest combination of hand with community cards wins and gets the whole pot. If there's a tie, the pot will be evenly split between the two or more winners. = Additional Notes = ○ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ○ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/mjapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa- Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? description: It's time to dig out those 3D specs... Draw3D, retro 3D drawing tool with real anaglyph 3D- watch your sketches come to life on your screen! The full version also lets you save and publish your retro art to our 3D Gallery to be seen, admired & rated worldwide.

Based on a very addictive Japanese game "Don't Step the White Tile" where you should not tap on white tile. Time Attack Mode: You have to step on 50 Black Tiles as fast as you can. Long Run Mode: You have 10 seconds to tap as many black tiles as you can. Sudden Attack Mode: If you tap after 10th Second, you are failed. So be careful while tapping. Enjoy. This app is also known as - Don't Step the white tile (Original Japanese version), Tile Step, Tile Escape, Box Tile Run, Tile Puzzle, DETAILED EXPLANATION: ---------------------------------------- Overview -------------- This game is all about stepping on Tiles as fast as you can while avoiding white tiles. Anyway, Once You Open Tile Step app you will be presented with 3 game modes. --Time Attack Mode --------------------------- You have 50 tiles to Step and Unlimited time. Your goal is to beat your own high score. If you step on a white tile you r game is over. No points at all. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on a White tile. --Long Run Mode ----------------------- You have 10 Seconds to Step on as many tiles as you can. If you step 50 times before the 10th second, you will get additional 10 seconds. This time also, you should avoid stepping on White tile. If you step on White tile you will get 0 points. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on the White tile. --Sudden Stop Mode ---------------------------- This time you have only 10 seconds. But, you should stop stepping before 10 seconds while scoring as many tiles as you can. If you step after 10th Second, you game is over and you will score 0 points. This time also, you should avoid stepping on White tile. If you step on White tile you will get 0 points. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on the White tile. Enjoy =)

スクウェア・エニックスが贈る購読無料&登録不要のWEB雑誌「ガンガンONLINE」用の閲覧アプリです。毎週木曜＆第1・第3月曜更新で、描き下ろし新作コミックをお届け中！　月間1000ページ超（※2014年10月実績）の超強力エンターテイメントをぜひお楽しみください!! ■バージョンアップ情報 / ver2.0.6（2015/10/15） ・「Android 6.0 Marshmallow」に対応しました。 ・「お気に入り」メニューから作品を選んで、まとめて既読化できる機能を追加しました。 ・「お気に入り」メニューから作品を選んで、まとめてダウンロードできる機能を追加しました。 ・「お気に入り」「本棚」画面で【ダウンロードして読む】を選択した作品を、ダウンロードしながらビューワーで開けるようにしました。 ■バージョンアップ情報 / ver2.0.4（2015/6/19） ・表示されている作品と異なるコンテンツが「お気に入り」として登録されてしまう不具合を修正しました。 ■バージョンアップ情報 / ver2.0.2（2015/2/4） ・コンテンツダウンロードを高速化しました。 ・コンテンツダウンロードのたびにステータスバーに通知が表示されないよう修正しました。 ・コンテンツダウンロード中、プログレスバー以外をタップしてもダウンロードを停止しないようにしました。 ・ビューワの明るさの設定を端末の明るさ設定に合わせるチェックボックスを追加しました。 ■バージョンアップ情報 / ver2.0.1（2014/12/10） ・Android 5.0 でビューワが起動しない問題に対応しました。 ・G's One にて、起動出来ない不具合を修正しました。 ・その他、挙動を微修正しました。 ■ホーム画面アイコン動作不良につきまして（2014/11/18） ガンガンONLINEのスマホ・タブレット用の新アプリにおきまして、 下記の不具合を確認しております。 ・対象端末 Android搭載のスマートフォンもしくはタブレット。 ・症状 ホーム画面上のアイコンをタップしてもアプリが起動しないことがある。 ・対策 ホーム画面上のアイコン（ショートカット）を削除して、 サイドショートカットを作り直していただく。 ご迷惑をおかけし申し訳ございませんが、 こちらの不具合の生じているお客様は上記の対策をお試しいただけますと幸いです。 ■バージョンアップ情報 / ver2.0.x（2014/11） バージョン2.0.xに大規模アップデートしました！ ・好きな作品の更新がわかる「お気に入り機能」を追加！ ・作品検索、画面表示、小説表示ほかビューワー機能を大幅強化！ 対応OS： Android 4.0.x以降 ※一部、未対応のAndroid端末もございます。

description: Get the latest local news for Rochester with the Democrat and Chronicle Android app. The app is free to download and the Home section is available to all users. Your subscription includes access to this app, online, mobile website, e-newspaper and, if you choose, home delivery of the print edition. After downloading the app, tap on the key icon to start your subscription, or you can also sign in to the app using your existing Democrat and Chronicle account. • Up to the minute local news • Current weather conditions, 10 day forecast and radar map • Captivating full screen video and photo galleries • The latest national and collegiate sports and scores • News alerts sent to your device with an option to set a quiet time period • Business, entertainment and more More about subscriptions: - Subscription is 1 month for $13.00 plus applicable taxes - Subscription automatically continues at the then regular published monthly price unless you cancel your subscription. You will continue to get access for the remainder of your monthly billing cycle and your subscription will not be renewed the following month. - You can cancel your subscription at any time from your Google Play account settings after purchase - Not valid with any other offers. - Excludes advertisements that are designated for home delivery with the print edition. - Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase - Please contact us at 1-800-790-9565 if you have any problems accessing your subscription It’s what everyone’s talking about — enjoy the Android app for Democrat and Chronicle — Rochester’s leading source for local news and information
